service-keys-enter-public-beta-for-syste.title: Service Keys enter public beta for system-to-system integrations
service-keys-enter-public-beta-for-syste.description: Service Keys are now available in public beta as a new authentication option for account-level, system-to-system integrations. This feature is intended to replace legacy private apps and is built on HubSpot’s modern Developer Platform infrastructure.
service-keys-enter-public-beta-for-syste.author: dedson@hubspot.com (Dennis Edson)

automatic-migration-from-cookie-consent-.title: Automatic migration from Cookie Consent Banner v1 to v2
automatic-migration-from-cookie-consent-.description: Starting May 11, 2026, HubSpot will resume the automatic migration of accounts from the legacy Cookie Consent Banner (v1) to the current version (v2). This process was previously announced and later paused to allow more time for manual adoption. This update ensures all accounts use a banner that meets modern accessibility standards and supports the latest privacy features. While the migration happens automatically on this date, you can manually opt-in ahead of time to test the new version within
automatic-migration-from-cookie-consent-.author: jmclaren@hubspot.com (Jon McLaren)

december-2025-developer-rollup.title: December 2025 Developer Rollup
december-2025-developer-rollup.description: This month’s updates focus on enhancing developer workflows and platform security, featuring a new IP Ranges API for firewall management and the general availability of the App Uninstallation API. We’ve also introduced several quality-of-life improvements, including a Legacy CRM Card Converter to assist in your migration to modern App Cards, setting a custom template for CPQ quotes, actionable migration insights directly within your HubSpot Account, and expanded Breeze Assistant capabilities for
december-2025-developer-rollup.author: dadams@hubspot.com (David Adams)

legacy-standard-sandboxes-sunset-what-s-.title: Legacy Standard Sandboxes Sunset: What’s Changing & How to Prepare (FAQ)
legacy-standard-sandboxes-sunset-what-s-.description: We recently introduced an improved Standard Sandbox, including the new Deploy to Production feature for the most requested supported asset types . These enhancements empower RevOps and Marketing Ops teams to safely test business logic, data flows, and nurture workflows in a dedicated environment without risking disruption in their production accounts.
legacy-standard-sandboxes-sunset-what-s-.author: dedson@hubspot.com (Dennis Edson)

november-2025-developer-rollup.title: November 2025 Developer Rollup
november-2025-developer-rollup.description: November brings a rollup with several updates across the platform. We've expanded record limits for Orders and Carts objects, increased association limits fivefold to 250,000 per object type, and launched the new Projects API for programmatic project management. We're also introducing property validation rules via the public CRM API, releasing HubSpot CLI 7.10.0 with dependency updates and enhanced MCP tooling, and rolling out flexible header and footer switching in the CMS. On the governance fr
november-2025-developer-rollup.author: alaporte@hubspot.com (AJ LaPorte)

legacy-developer-accounts-migrating-to-t.title: Legacy Developer Accounts Migrating to the Unified Developer Platform
legacy-developer-accounts-migrating-to-t.description: All legacy developer accounts are being upgraded to HubSpot’s new unified Developer Platform experience. This migration brings developer tools and resources together into a single HubSpot account, replacing older, separate tools with one consistent experience when building on HubSpot.
legacy-developer-accounts-migrating-to-t.author: dedson@hubspot.com (Dennis Edson)

form-submissions-now-show-up-on-company-.title: Form Submissions Now Show Up on Company Records
form-submissions-now-show-up-on-company-.description:
Finally! You can now see form submissions from all associated contacts directly on the company timeline. No more clicking into individual contact records to piece together what's happening at an account level. This is huge for account-based teams. When you're evaluating whether a company is engaged, you need the full picture in one place. Now you've got it. Just head to the company record, click the Activity tab, and filter by Form Submissions under Contact Activity. Availability:
Now live for a

rule-based-automated-tracking-for-intent.title: Rule-Based Automated Tracking for Intent Signals
rule-based-automated-tracking-for-intent.description: If you're using buyer intent signals, you know the pain of manually managing which companies to track. This update adds simple toggle-based rules so you can automatically start or stop tracking companies based on target account status, lifecycle stage, or segment membership. The real win here is database hygiene. You can set it to automatically stop tracking when a company becomes a customer (so you're not burning credits on closed accounts) and start tracking when they hit a key lifecycle stage

help-desk-recent-searches.title: Help Desk Recent Searches
help-desk-recent-searches.description:
A small quality-of-life improvement for service teams: the help desk now shows your three most recent searches directly in the search popover. Click any of them to re-run the search with the same filters. If you're constantly searching for the same ticket types or using specific filter combinations, this saves a surprising amount of time over the course of a day. Learn more about how to search in the help desk. Availability:
Now live for Service Hub Professional and Enterprise.

filters-in-agent-inbox.title: Filters in Agent Inbox
filters-in-agent-inbox.description: The Breeze agent inbox got a major upgrade with comprehensive filtering. You can now filter by execution status (e.g. Success, Error, Needs Approval, Running), request source (e.g. Breeze Studio, Automation, MCP Connector, API, CRM Card), specific agents, and owners. Before this, busy inboxes were basically a chronological list you had to scroll through. Now you can quickly surface what actually needs your attention, like items requiring approval or executions that errored out. Super admins also

report-viewer-gets-full-screen-mode-and-.title: Report Viewer Gets Full-Screen Mode and Customizable Display
report-viewer-gets-full-screen-mode-and-.description:
The report viewer now lets you show or hide settings panels, navigate between reports more easily, and enter full-screen mode. Your display preferences are remembered as you move between reports. It sounds minor, but if you're presenting data to stakeholders or just want to focus on the visualization without all the chrome around it, full-screen mode is genuinely useful. Availability:
Now live for all HubSpot products and tiers.

custom-views-on-reports-and-dashboards-l.title: Custom Views on Reports and Dashboards Lists
custom-views-on-reports-and-dashboards-l.description:
As your report library grows, finding the right report becomes a scavenger hunt. Custom views let you create personalized, filtered views of your reports and dashboards using criteria like owner, shared status, date created, last viewed, and tags. You can pin views as tabs, share them with your team or keep them private, and stop wasting time scrolling through hundreds of reports to find the five you actually use. Availability:
Now live for all Professional and Enterprise subscriptions.

drag-and-drop-and-marquee-select-in-file.title: Drag-and-Drop and Marquee Select in File Manager
drag-and-drop-and-marquee-select-in-file.description:
You can now bulk select files in the File Manager by dragging your cursor across them (marquee select in grid view) and then drag the whole group into a folder in one motion. In list view, you still need to use checkboxes, but you can drag selected files into folders. For content teams managing lots of assets, this eliminates a ton of tedious clicking. It's the kind of update that makes you wonder why it wasn't always this way. Note:
Marquee select only works in grid view. Availability:
Now live

import-auto-detects-date-formatting.title: Import Auto-Detects Date Formatting
import-auto-detects-date-formatting.description:
"Could not parse date" is one of the most common import errors. Now, when you import data with date properties, HubSpot automatically detects the format based on your file instead of defaulting to portal settings and making you fix it manually. It supports day/month/year, month/day/year, and year/month/day formats. If your file has inconsistent formatting, you can use find-and-replace to clean it up before importing. Availability:
Now live for all hubs and tiers.

streamlined-association-management-in-da.title: Streamlined Association Management in Data Model
streamlined-association-management-in-da.description:
Managing object associations just got easier. You can now activate existing associations and create new ones (including with custom objects for Enterprise) directly from the data model view. Deactivated associations are hidden from view, keeping things cleaner. Navigate to Data Management > Data Model, click Edit Data Model, and use the plus button on any object to add associations or the ellipsis to deactivate them. Learn more by watching this short video walkthrough. Availability:
Now live for

export-workflow-enrollments-and-action-l.title: Export Workflow Enrollments and Action Logs to CSV
export-workflow-enrollments-and-action-l.description:
You could always export workflow history to a segment, but customers have been asking for CSV exports for ages. Now you can export detailed enrollment and action-level data into a CSV file for analysis in Excel, Google Sheets, or your reporting tools. This is a big deal for debugging, auditing, and understanding exactly what your automations are doing at scale. From the workflow history view, just click Export and choose enrollments or action logs. Availability:
Now live for Marketing Hub, Sales

business-days-support-for-workflow-delay.title: Business Days Support for Workflow Delays
business-days-support-for-workflow-delay.description:
Workflow delays can now exclude weekends. Enable the new Business Days option, and a 1-day delay on Friday will push the next action to Monday instead of Saturday. This sounds simple, but it solves a real problem. No more emails landing on weekends when your team isn't around to respond, and no more awkward timing logic to work around calendar days. Note:
This excludes weekends only. It doesn't account for holidays or business hours. Availability:
Now live for Marketing Hub, Sales Hub, Service H

lifecycle-stage-conditional-property-log.title: Lifecycle Stage Conditional Property Logic
lifecycle-stage-conditional-property-log.description: You can now use lifecycle stage as a controlling property for conditional logic. When a contact or company hits a specific stage, you can automatically surface relevant fields and make them required before the record saves. For example, when a rep moves a contact from Lead to MQL, you can require them to fill in qualification notes or budget range. This enforces data quality at the exact moments it matters, without manual reminders or cleanup later. Learn more by watching a quick walkthrough vid

enhancements-to-property-creation.title: Enhancements to Property Creation
enhancements-to-property-creation.description:
Creating properties outside of Property Settings just got more powerful. You can now create calculation, rollup, and property sync types from places like the index page or during imports. Plus, you can switch between manual and Breeze-assisted creation depending on what you need. The bigger picture: you can stay in the zone and create complex properties without navigating away to Settings. Availability:
Now live for all hubs and tiers.

view-related-records-and-clean-up-associ.title: View Related Records and Clean Up Associations in Bulk
view-related-records-and-clean-up-associ.description:
CRM associations get stale. Contacts change companies, deals shift ownership, imports create bad relationships. Cleaning this up used to require manual updates one by one or developer help. Now you can select up to 100 records from any index page, click Review Associations, and see all their relationships in a single structured view. From there, you can select and remove incorrect associations in bulk. Filter by association type or label to zero in on what needs fixing. Availability:
Public beta

set-default-property-values.title: Set Default Property Values
set-default-property-values.description:
Admins can now define default values for properties that automatically apply when new records are created. This works across manual entry, workflows, and APIs. If your team constantly enters the same values when creating records, this eliminates that repetitive work and keeps data consistent from the start. It also means you can retire those workflows you built just to initialize property values. Note:
Not currently supported for calculations, rollups, syncs, or file properties. Availability:
Pu

custom-actions-support-for-enrolled-non-.title: Custom Actions Support for Enrolled & Non-Enrolled Records
custom-actions-support-for-enrolled-non-.description: HubSpot enhances workflows with event-based support, adding a requiresObject flag and per-action object targeting. Custom actions can run without an enrolled object and will show a target object selector, defaulting to the workflow’s enrolled object. The change rolls out on November 24, 2025.

take-action-with-claude-update-crm-recor.title: Take Action With Claude: Update CRM Records and Access Engagement History
take-action-with-claude-update-crm-recor.description:
The HubSpot connector for Claude now supports write actions. Create contacts and deals, log notes and tasks, and update records directly from Claude's chat window. Claude can also access your full engagement history, emails, calls, meetings, tasks, and notes, to provide context-aware recommendations. "Create a new contact for [Name] with email [address]"
"Update the deal 'Enterprise Package Q4' to Closed Won"
"Summarize all my emails with [Contact] from the last month" If sensitive data is enabl

developer-updates-for-january-2026.title: Developer updates for January 2026
developer-updates-for-january-2026.description: HubSpot’s January dev updates roll out major app improvements across UI Extensions, GPT‑5 Breeze Studio, SSO propagation to sandboxes, HTML editing for quotes, a redesigned Sandbox listing, omnichannel Customer Agent support, expanded Campaign asset types via API, lifecycle metrics, marketplace analytics, and new public betas like Forecast Read API and secure preference URL.

new-oauth-v3-api-endpoints-and-standardi.title: New OAuth v3 API Endpoints and Standardized Error Responses
new-oauth-v3-api-endpoints-and-standardi.description: HubSpot boosts security with OAuth v3 endpoints and RFC 6749 compliant error responses. New /v3/token and /v3/introspect for token handling plus standardized error fields, while v1 is deprecated with a sunset timeline in 2026. Migrate now to the new endpoints and standard errors.

introducing-hubspot-cli-v8-0-0.title: Introducing HubSpot CLI v8.0.0
introducing-hubspot-cli-v8-0-0.description: HubSpot CLI v8.0.0 introduces breaking changes with a Node 20 minimum, removal of deprecated commands and legacy behaviors, and dropped support for older project versions. A major cleanup aligning with platform updates, effective February 9 2026.

public-beta-self-service-mcp-auth-apps-f.title: Public Beta: Self-Service MCP Auth Apps for the HubSpot Remote MCP Server
public-beta-self-service-mcp-auth-apps-f.description: Ecosystem partners and customers can now build and manage their own AI connectors to the (Beta) HubSpot Remote MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server through a streamlined self-service interface. This public beta builds on the initial release of the HubSpot Remote MCP Server and simplifies the experience  of creating and managing AI connectors directly.
public-beta-self-service-mcp-auth-apps-f.author: dedson@hubspot.com (Dennis Edson)

new-hubspot-app-updates-ai-automation-cr.title: New HubSpot App Updates: AI, Automation & CRM Sync (Q4 2025)
new-hubspot-app-updates-ai-automation-cr.description: HubSpot Marketplace closes Q4 with 76+ new apps and a wave of updates that slash silos and boost productivity. New AI tools and CRM integrations with Claude and ChatGPT unlock faster prospecting, dynamic docs, and richer dashboards for smarter, faster selling.

manage-ticket-re-opening-in-help-desk.title: Manage Ticket Re-Opening in Help Desk
manage-ticket-re-opening-in-help-desk.description: Support teams finally have control over what happens when customers reply to closed tickets. Previously, any reply would automatically reopen the original ticket, even months later, which would significantly disrupt reporting and SLAs. Now, you can use workflows to define exactly when tickets should reopen versus when a new ticket should be created instead. The new workflow template uses properties like "Last closed date" to set your preferred window (for example, three days), and automatically

customizable-sequence-unenrollment-trigg.title: Customizable Sequence Unenrollment Triggers
customizable-sequence-unenrollment-trigg.description: Sequences no longer have to end the moment a contact replies or books a meeting. You can now toggle off these default unenrollment triggers in the sequence builder's Automate tab, giving you flexibility to continue outreach flows when it makes sense, like nurture campaigns where a reply doesn't mean the conversation is over. You can also separately control whether replies or meetings should unenroll all contacts at that company, not just the individual. These settings remain on by default to pre
customizable-sequence-unenrollment-trigg.availability: Sales Hub Professional and Enterprise, Service Hub Professional and Enterprise

new-company-news-signals-for-buyer-inten.title: New Company News Signals for Buyer Intent
new-company-news-signals-for-buyer-inten.description: Five new Buyer Intent signals help you spot when target accounts are growing or making moves. You'll now see alerts when tracked companies hire C-level executives, launch products, announce strategic partnerships, complete mergers and acquisitions, or report growth metrics like revenue increases. These signals appear on company record timelines and work in workflows, list filters, and scoring models, just like your existing intent signals.
new-company-news-signals-for-buyer-inten.availability: Now live for accounts with HubSpot Credits

help-desk-search-experience-updates.title: Help Desk Search Experience Updates
help-desk-search-experience-updates.description: Finding tickets in high-volume queues just got easier. The updated search experience includes a new popover with pre-search filters (like limiting results to closed tickets), an improved results page that reflects your filters, and smoother overall interactions.

payments-in-the-new-forms-editor.title: Payments in the New Forms Editor
payments-in-the-new-forms-editor.description: You can now collect payments directly through forms built in the new editor. Add a payment link as a redirect destination after form submission, either for all visitors or conditionally based on their responses. Both form data and payment details stay connected in HubSpot for easy tracking.
payments-in-the-new-forms-editor.availability: Rolling out gradually for all products and tiers; conditional logic requires Marketing Hub or Content Hub Professional or Enterprise

create-contacts-from-the-chrome-extensio.title: Create Contacts from the Chrome Extension
create-contacts-from-the-chrome-extensio.description: While researching a company's website, you can now create contacts directly in the HubSpot Chrome extension without switching tabs. The contact is automatically associated with the company you're viewing, keeping your prospecting momentum going. Check out our top features that are now available in public beta to all eligible customers.
create-contacts-from-the-chrome-extensio.availability: Now live for all HubSpot products and tiers

restore-property-edits-for-bulk-changes.title: Restore Property Edits for Bulk Changes
restore-property-edits-for-bulk-changes.description: Made a mistake with a workflow or import that changed data you didn't mean to touch? Restore Property Edits lets you bulk restore recent property changes within the last seven days. Navigate to CRM > Actions > Restore Property Edits, filter by source, property type, and date, preview what you're about to restore, and click to apply. Restored records won't re-enroll in workflows or lists.
restore-property-edits-for-bulk-changes.availability: Public beta for Enterprise customers with super admin permissions

deploy-customer-agent-through-workflows-.title: Deploy Customer Agent Through Workflows and Chatflows
deploy-customer-agent-through-workflows-.description: You can now trigger Customer Agent responses as part of your automated workflows or existing bot logic, no additional setup required. Use workflow branches based on contact, ticket, or conversation properties to control exactly when the agent engages, whether that's routing billing inquiries to AI first or deploying the agent only for specific customer segments.
deploy-customer-agent-through-workflows-.availability: Public beta for Professional and Enterprise tiers across all hubs

snooze-tickets-in-help-desk.title: Snooze Tickets in Help Desk
snooze-tickets-in-help-desk.description: Temporarily hide tickets from your views to stay focused on what needs attention now. Tickets automatically unsnooze when customers reply, the snooze time expires, or you manually bring them back.
snooze-tickets-in-help-desk.availability: Public beta for seated Service Hub Professional and Enterprise users

create-quotes-through-breeze-assistant.title: Create Quotes Through Breeze Assistant
create-quotes-through-breeze-assistant.description: Generate quotes from anywhere in HubSpot by asking Breeze. The assistant intelligently selects templates and lets you preview the quote outline before creation. The more details you provide, such as template or line items, the better the result. This month's updates center on giving teams more control over ticket lifecycles, sequence behavior, AI agents, and more. Whether you're managing high-volume support queues or fine-tuning your sales automation, these updates help improve how your team wor
create-quotes-through-breeze-assistant.availability: Public beta for Commerce Hub Professional and Enterprise

aeo-grader-goes-global-now-available-in-.title: AEO Grader Goes Global: Now Available in 5 New Languages

introducing-hubspot-for-sheets-your-crm-.title: Introducing HubSpot for Sheets: Your CRM, Now In Google Workspace

introducing-the-new-aeo-grader-get-advan.title: Introducing the New AEO Grader: Get Advanced Insights for AI Visibility

introducing-the-hubspot-connector-for-cl.title: Introducing the HubSpot connector for Claude

hubspot-connector-for-chatgpt.title: HubSpot connector for ChatGPT
hubspot-connector-for-chatgpt.description: The expanded HubSpot connector for ChatGPT now handles both quick everyday questions and deep research tasks. You can leverage AI to analyze your CRM data and get insights through natural language queries. *available to all hubs and tiers

hubspot-product-update-new-security-cont.title: HubSpot Product Update - New Security Contact Role

hubspot-payments-is-now-available-in-can.title: HubSpot Payments is now available in Canada and the UK! 🚀

revealed-emerging-app-themes-from-q2-202.title: Revealed: Emerging app themes from Q2 2025

redesigned-email-editor.title: Redesigned Email Editor
redesigned-email-editor.description: HubSpot's email editor gets a complete overhaul with a modern, full-canvas interface that puts everything you need in one view. You can now set your audience, sender information, subject line, and preview text alongside your email body with no more jumping between tabs. This redesign addresses longstanding feedback about the editor feeling cluttered and difficult to learn. The streamlined layout reduces creation time and makes onboarding new team members significantly easier. Key navigation chan

unified-landing-page-creation.title: Unified Landing Page Creation
unified-landing-page-creation.description: The landing page creation flow now combines manual and AI-powered workflows into a single experience. Instead of choosing upfront whether to use AI, you select a template first, then decide whether to generate content with Breeze or write it yourself. This eliminates the friction of committing to a creation method before you've even started. You get flexibility without losing access to AI assistance when you want it.

ai-landing-pages-image-generation.title: AI Landing Pages: Image Generation
ai-landing-pages-image-generation.description: When generating landing pages with AI, you now control your image source. The default is placeholder images, but you can opt into AI-generated images or pull from your file manager. This matters for teams with strict brand or legal requirements around imagery. It also speeds up page generation since AI image creation adds processing time. If you choose file manager images but no suitable match exists, the system falls back to placeholders automatically. Note: Requires "Give users access to gener

train-the-customer-agent-on-videos.title: Train the Customer Agent on Videos
train-the-customer-agent-on-videos.description: Your Customer Agent can now learn directly from video content. Upload video files or import from publicly hosted URLs (YouTube not supported) to expand your agent's knowledge base. This is particularly valuable if your training content already lives in product demos, tutorials, or recorded walkthroughs. You can leverage existing video assets without recreating them as written documentation. How to add videos: Go to Service > Customer Agent > Knowledge tab > Content Sources > Add Content.

convert-crm-views-to-segments.title: Convert CRM Views to Segments
convert-crm-views-to-segments.description: Any saved CRM view can now become a segment with one click. The new "Save as segment" action in the Filters menu carries over your filter logic automatically, no rebuilding required. Previously, creating a segment meant recreating filters you'd already perfected in a view. This update bridges exploration and action, letting you move directly from identifying an audience to engaging it through campaigns, workflows, or reports. If a filter isn't supported for segments, you'll see a clear error mes
convert-crm-views-to-segments.availability: Now live for all hubs and tiers.

breeze-powered-property-creation-with-va.title: Breeze-Powered Property Creation with Validations
breeze-powered-property-creation-with-va.description:
Breeze can now generate custom properties with validation rules using natural language. Describe what you need, including formatting requirements and constraints, and Breeze creates the property with appropriate validations. "I need a percentage property where the value should be between 0 and 100 and allow up to 2 decimal places."
"I need a Scheduled appointment date property where the date must be in 2024 and only allow weekdays." This reduces the technical burden on admins while ensuring cons

apple-pay-and-google-pay-with-stripe.title: Apple Pay and Google Pay with Stripe
apple-pay-and-google-pay-with-stripe.description: If you use Stripe payment processing, your buyers can now pay with Apple Pay and Google Pay, no setup required. If you accept credit or debit cards, digital wallets are automatically enabled. To track which transactions used digital wallets, add the "Digital wallet type" column to your Payments Index page.

multi-account-workflows.title: Multi-Account Workflows
multi-account-workflows.description: You can now create workflows that update contact records across connected HubSpot accounts. Build automation in one account that creates or updates contacts in linked accounts within your organization. This solves real problems for multi-brand organizations: routing form submissions between regional accounts, running cross-sell campaigns after purchases, and keeping contact properties synchronized. Learn more How to access: Settings > Organization Management > Multi-Account > Asset Copying tab.
multi-account-workflows.availability: Requires at least two HubSpot accounts, with one having Marketing Hub Enterprise and the other having any Professional or Enterprise subscription

orders-invoices-and-carts-in-data-model-.title: Orders, Invoices, and Carts in Data Model Builder
orders-invoices-and-carts-in-data-model-.description: Orders, carts, and invoices now appear in the data model builder, giving you a centralized view of these objects alongside your other CRM data. You can review properties, understand associations, and navigate to object settings. For orders and invoices specifically, you can create associations to custom objects and set custom association labels and limits. Learn more Check out our top features that are now available in public beta to all eligible customers.
orders-invoices-and-carts-in-data-model-.availability: Data model builder available for all hubs and tiers. Custom object functionality requires Enterprise. Association labels and limits require Professional or Enterprise.

help-desk-custom-views-based-on-contact-.title: Help Desk: Custom Views Based on Contact and Company Properties
help-desk-custom-views-based-on-contact-.description: Create help desk views filtered by contact and company properties, not just ticket properties. Build views like "Tickets from VIP contacts" or "Enterprise company issues" that match how your team actually works Send feedback to: helpdeskfeedback@hubspot.com
help-desk-custom-views-based-on-contact-.availability: Public Beta for Service Hub Professional and Enterprise

hubspot-connector-for-gemini.title: HubSpot Connector for Gemini
hubspot-connector-for-gemini.description: Query contacts, companies, and deals directly in Google Gemini, then draft follow-up content to use back in HubSpot. Works in Gemini's main interface and the sidebar in Gmail, Docs, Sheets, and Chat. Currently read-only. Requires Google Workspace Business Standard, Business Plus, or Enterprise with Gemini Alpha enabled. Learn more
hubspot-connector-for-gemini.availability: Public Beta for all HubSpot customers with qualifying Google Workspace plans

scan-and-redact-sensitive-data-in-crm-ac.title: Scan and Redact Sensitive Data in CRM Activities
scan-and-redact-sensitive-data-in-crm-ac.description: Enterprise customers can now scan CRM activities (notes, calls, tasks, emails, meetings) for sensitive data like financial or health information. If you've activated Sensitive Data settings, you can also redact flagged information to permanently remove it. Scans cover the last 60 days of activity and help maintain data hygiene and compliance. How to access: Settings > Security > Sensitive Data

create-lead-segments.title: Create Lead Segments
create-lead-segments.description: You can now build segments using the Lead object, separate from Contact segmentation. Filter by lead properties, associated objects, and segment membership. Once created, lead segments integrate with Performance reporting to track size changes over time, workflows for enrollment triggers, and channel performance analysis. Requirement: Lead object must be activated in your account. November's key product updates reflect HubSpot's continued investment in three areas: making AI genuinely useful acr
create-lead-segments.availability: Public Beta for Sales Hub Professional and Enterprise

preview-segment-list-filters.title: Preview Segment (List) Filters
preview-segment-list-filters.description: Preview segment results before saving with real-time filtering. See exactly how many contacts match your criteria as you build, ensuring accurate audience targeting without trial and error. *available to all hubs and tiers

automation-overview-redesign.title: Automation Overview Redesign
automation-overview-redesign.description: Navigate automation capabilities with a completely redesigned overview page. Improved organization and clearer pathways help you discover and implement automation opportunities faster. *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

enhanced-segment-builder-experience-with.title: Enhanced Segment Builder Experience with New Advanced Features
enhanced-segment-builder-experience-with.description: Build more sophisticated segments with enhanced filtering capabilities. New advanced features provide greater control over audience definition, enabling more precise targeting. *available to all hubs and tiers

improvements-to-video-library-ui.title: Improvements to Video Library UI
improvements-to-video-library-ui.description: Navigate your video content more efficiently with an improved library interface. Enhanced organization, search, and preview capabilities make video management easier. *available to all Content Hub Pro+ customers

customize-brand-voice-and-identity-acros.title: Customize Brand Voice and Identity Across Brands
customize-brand-voice-and-identity-acros.description: Define unique AI voices for multiple brands or business units. Scale personalization across your portfolio with distinct brand personalities for each entity. *available to all hubs and tiers

redesigned-video-picker.title: Redesigned video picker
redesigned-video-picker.description: Select videos for content more easily with a redesigned picker interface. Improved search, filtering, and preview options help you find the right video quickly. *available to all Marketing and Content Hub Pro+ customers

leads-can-now-be-renamed-and-toggled-on-.title: Leads can now be renamed and toggled on/off
leads-can-now-be-renamed-and-toggled-on-.description: Customize lead terminology and visibility to match your sales process. Rename the lead object to fit your vocabulary or disable it entirely if not needed. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ Customers

create-quotes-from-deal-index.title: Create Quotes from Deal Index
create-quotes-from-deal-index.description: Generate quotes directly from your deal index view without opening individual records. Speed up your quoting process by creating and sending quotes in fewer clicks. *available to all Sales Hub customers

deal-insights-crm-card.title: Deal Insights CRM Card
deal-insights-crm-card.description: Get AI-powered insights about your deals directly on the record page. Surface important patterns, risks, and opportunities that help you prioritize actions and close deals faster. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ Customers

leads-are-now-a-standard-crm-object.title: Leads Are Now a Standard CRM Object
leads-are-now-a-standard-crm-object.description: Work with leads as a fully supported standard object. Previously in beta, leads now have complete CRM functionality including workflows, reports, and integrations. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ Customers

round-robin-new-ticket-distribution-opti.title: Round Robin: New ticket distribution option for Help desk tickets
round-robin-new-ticket-distribution-opti.description: Distribute incoming tickets evenly across your team with round-robin assignment. Ensure balanced workloads and faster response times with automated, fair ticket distribution. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

user-level-ticket-visibility-in-customer.title: User-Level Ticket Visibility in Customer Portal
user-level-ticket-visibility-in-customer.description: Control ticket visibility at the user level in the customer portal. Perfect for complex organizational structures where different users need access to different subsets of tickets for proper security and privacy. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

timestamp-visibility-in-the-customer-por.title: Timestamp visibility in the Customer portal
timestamp-visibility-in-the-customer-por.description: Display timestamp information in the customer portal for better transparency. Customers can see when tickets were created, updated, and resolved, improving communication and expectations. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

task-queues-in-cs-workspace.title: Task Queues in CS Workspace
task-queues-in-cs-workspace.description: Organize customer success tasks with dedicated queues. Prioritize activities, assign work, and track completion across your CS team with structured task management. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

availability-status-selector-set-tempora.title: Availability Status Selector: Set Temporary "Away" Status
availability-status-selector-set-tempora.description: Manage availability expectations with temporary away status. Set yourself as away for specific time periods, automatically returning to available when the period ends. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

help-desk-customizable-search-results-co.title: Help Desk Customizable Search Results Columns
help-desk-customizable-search-results-co.description: Customize which information appears in help desk search results. Tailor your view to show the most relevant ticket details, improving efficiency when reviewing search results. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

help-desk-spam-view-filters.title: Help Desk Spam View Filters
help-desk-spam-view-filters.description: Filter and manage spam tickets more effectively with dedicated spam view options. Keep your help desk clean by quickly identifying and handling spam submissions. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

spaces-dedicated-working-areas-for-teams.title: Spaces: Dedicated Working Areas for Teams in Help Desk
spaces-dedicated-working-areas-for-teams.description: Create dedicated workspaces for different support teams within the help desk. Each space has its own views, filters, and workflows, enabling teams to work efficiently without interference. *available to all Service Hub Enterprise customers

help-desk-search-improvements.title: Help Desk Search Improvements
help-desk-search-improvements.description: Find tickets and information faster with enhanced search capabilities. Improved relevance ranking and filtering help support teams locate what they need in seconds. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

pathfinder-in-customer-journey-analytics.title: Pathfinder in Customer Journey Analytics
pathfinder-in-customer-journey-analytics.description: Uncover the most common paths leads and customers take with your brand—automatically. Customer Journey Paths reveal patterns in how prospects navigate your touchpoints. *available to all Sales and Service Hub Enterprise customers

a-new-workflow-creation-experience.title: A new workflow creation experience
a-new-workflow-creation-experience.description: Create workflows faster with a completely redesigned creation experience. Improved UI and intelligent suggestions help you build automation more efficiently. *available to all Sales and Service Hub Pro+ customers

blocked-numbers-list-outbound-calls.title: Blocked Numbers List (Outbound Calls)
blocked-numbers-list-outbound-calls.description: Maintain a blocklist of numbers your team should never call. Prevent accidental outreach to competitors, unsubscribed contacts, or other restricted numbers, protecting your reputation. *available to all Sales and Service Hub Starter+ customers

import-goals-via-csv.title: Import Goals via CSV
import-goals-via-csv.description: Bulk import goals from CSV files to scale your goal-setting process. Perfect for setting team or company-wide goals without manual one-by-one creation. *available to all Sales and Service Hub Starter+ customers

customize-quote-acceptance-section-with-.title: Customize Quote Acceptance Section with Rich Text
customize-quote-acceptance-section-with-.description: Personalize the quote acceptance experience with rich text formatting. Add branded messaging, terms, and calls-to-action that reinforce your value proposition at the moment of decision. *available to all Commerce Hub Pro+ customers

updated-quote-expiration-logic-for-cpq.title: Updated Quote Expiration Logic for CPQ
updated-quote-expiration-logic-for-cpq.description: Manage quote validity with improved expiration logic. Set precise expiration rules that automatically update quote status, ensuring prospects work with current pricing and terms. *available to all Commerce Hub Pro+ customers

new-bank-debit-payment-methods-sepa-bacs.title: New Bank Debit Payment Methods (SEPA, BACS, PADs) for HubSpot Payments
new-bank-debit-payment-methods-sepa-bacs.description: Accept bank debit payments from European and international customers. SEPA, BACS, and PADs support expands your payment options, reducing friction for customers who prefer direct debit. *available to Commerce Hub customers with HubSpot Payments

automatically-apply-checkout-fees-based-.title: Automatically Apply Checkout Fees Based on Payment Method
automatically-apply-checkout-fees-based-.description: Add processing fees or surcharges automatically based on selected payment method. Maintain margins by passing along payment processing costs transparently at checkout. *available to all Commerce Hub customers

subscription-retries-for-card-payments.title: Subscription Retries for Card Payments
subscription-retries-for-card-payments.description: Automatically retry failed subscription payments with smart retry logic. Reduce involuntary churn by attempting charges at optimal times, recovering revenue from temporary payment issues. *available to all hubs and tiers

additional-quote-activity-tracking.title: Additional Quote Activity Tracking
additional-quote-activity-tracking.description: Track more quote interactions including views, downloads, and time spent. Understand prospect engagement with your quotes to time follow-ups perfectly and address concerns proactively. *available to all Commerce Hub Pro+ customers

easily-request-new-data-sources-for-data.title: Easily request new data sources for data studio
easily-request-new-data-sources-for-data.description: Submit requests for new data source integrations directly from data studio. Help shape the data studio roadmap by requesting the connections you need most. *available to all Data Hub Pro+ customers

databricks-connection-to-data-studio.title: Databricks connection to Data Studio
databricks-connection-to-data-studio.description: Connect Databricks to HubSpot's data studio for advanced analytics. Bridge your data warehouse with CRM data for unified business intelligence and reporting. *available to all Data Hub Enterprise customers

google-meet-app-new-redesign-for-advance.title: Google Meet App: New Redesign for Advanced Global Settings
google-meet-app-new-redesign-for-advance.description: Configure Google Meet integration with a redesigned settings interface. Improved organization makes it easier to manage meeting recording, transcription, and sync preferences. *available to all hubs and tiers

app-workflow-action-insights.title: App workflow Action Insights
app-workflow-action-insights.description: Understand how custom workflow actions perform with detailed insights. Track execution times, success rates, and errors to optimize your custom automation. *available to all hubs and tiers

2-000-apps-and-2-5m-active-installs-new-.title: 2,000+ Apps and 2.5M+ Active Installs: New and Recently Updated Apps
2-000-apps-and-2-5m-active-installs-new-.description: Explore an expanding ecosystem with over 2,000 apps and 2.5 million active installations. Browse newly added and recently updated integrations to extend HubSpot's capabilities. *available to all hubs and tiers

zapier-app-additional-crm-objects-suppor.title: Zapier App: Additional CRM Objects Support
zapier-app-additional-crm-objects-suppor.description: Connect more HubSpot objects to Zapier with expanded support. Automate workflows between HubSpot and 5,000+ apps using more of your CRM data. *available to all hubs and tiers

partner-app-churn-analysis.title: Partner App Churn Analysis
partner-app-churn-analysis.description: Understand app usage patterns with partner churn analysis. Track which apps are being uninstalled and why, helping developers improve retention. *available to all hubs and tiers

edit-in-descript.title: Edit in Descript
edit-in-descript.description: Edit videos directly in Descript from HubSpot. Seamlessly move between platforms to refine your video content with professional editing tools. *available to all HubSpot Pro+ customers

enhanced-board-experience-and-board-view.title: Enhanced board experience and Board View for Contacts & Companies
enhanced-board-experience-and-board-view.description: Visualize contacts and companies in board view with enhanced functionality. Manage your entire CRM visually with drag-and-drop workflows that work beyond just deals. *available to all hubs and tiers

updated-crm-association-cards.title: Updated CRM Association Cards
updated-crm-association-cards.description: Navigate associated records more efficiently with improved association cards. Enhanced sorting, searching, and inline scrolling make it easier to find and manage related records. *available to all hubs and tiers

customer-agent-ai-recommended-short-answ.title: Customer Agent AI Recommended Short Answers
customer-agent-ai-recommended-short-answ.description: Improve AI agent responses with recommended short answers. The AI suggests concise, relevant replies that can be sent with one click, speeding up customer support. *available to all HubSpot Pro+ customers

enhanced-safeguards-for-bulk-subscriptio.title: Enhanced safeguards for bulk subscription changes
enhanced-safeguards-for-bulk-subscriptio.description: Protect against accidental bulk subscription changes with enhanced warnings and confirmations. Additional safeguards prevent mass unsubscribes or subscription modifications. *available to all hubs and tiers

import-now-shows-file-requirements-on-th.title: Import now shows file requirements on the file upload step of import
import-now-shows-file-requirements-on-th.description: Understand import requirements before uploading with inline guidance. See required file formats, column mappings, and data expectations right when you need them. *available to all hubs and tiers

personalization-tokens-in-email-template.title: Personalization tokens in email templates now support fallback values
personalization-tokens-in-email-template.description: Ensure professional email presentation with fallback values for personalization tokens. When contact data is missing, your specified fallback displays instead of blank spaces or errors. *available to all hubs and tiers

login-experience-redesign.title: Login Experience Redesign
login-experience-redesign.description: Log in faster with a streamlined authentication experience. The redesigned login flow is more intuitive and secure, reducing friction while maintaining enterprise-grade security. *available to all hubs and tiers

remove-whitespace-and-format-casing-in-t.title: Remove Whitespace and Format Casing in Text Properties
remove-whitespace-and-format-casing-in-t.description: Maintain pristine data quality with automatic text formatting that removes extra whitespace and applies consistent casing. Say goodbye to messy data entry and standardized records. *available to all hubs and tiers

enhanced-filtering-with-new-contains-exa.title: Enhanced Filtering with New "Contains Exactly" Operators
enhanced-filtering-with-new-contains-exa.description: Filter records with precision using new "contains exactly" operators. Find exact matches in multi-select fields and text properties, improving list accuracy and segment precision. *available to all hubs and tiers

object-library-migrating-into-data-model.title: Object Library Migrating into Data Model Builder
object-library-migrating-into-data-model.description: Access your custom objects in the unified data model builder. This migration consolidates object management, making it easier to understand and configure your CRM structure. *available to all hubs and tiers

target-object-name-in-security-activity-.title: Target Object Name in Security Activity Export
target-object-name-in-security-activity-.description: Export security activity logs with human-readable object names included. Improve audit efficiency by seeing what was accessed without cross-referencing IDs. *available to all hubs and tiers

drag-and-drop-reports-onto-a-dashboard.title: Drag and Drop Reports onto a Dashboard
drag-and-drop-reports-onto-a-dashboard.description: Build dashboards faster with drag-and-drop functionality. A new side panel lets you browse and add saved reports or templates directly to your dashboard. *available to all hubs and tiers

custom-assistants-can-now-read-hubspot-c.title: Custom Assistants can now read HubSpot CRM data
custom-assistants-can-now-read-hubspot-c.description: Empower custom assistants with direct access to CRM data. Your specialized AI assistants can now query contacts, deals, and other records to provide contextual, data-driven responses. *available to all HubSpot Starter+ customers

tiered-pricing-line-items-on-mobile.title: Tiered Pricing Line Items on Mobile
tiered-pricing-line-items-on-mobile.description: Manage tiered pricing structures from mobile devices. View and edit complex pricing tiers on the go, ensuring your sales team can quote accurately anywhere. *available to all Commerce Hub Pro+ customers

view-reports-in-the-breeze-mobile-app.title: View Reports in the Breeze Mobile App
view-reports-in-the-breeze-mobile-app.description: Access your dashboards and reports from the Breeze mobile app. Stay informed with analytics on the go, making data-driven decisions from anywhere. *available to all hubs and tiers

speech-to-text-into-the-breeze-assistant.title: Speech To Text into the Breeze Assistant mobile app — Now on Android and iOS
speech-to-text-into-the-breeze-assistant.description: Interact with the Breeze Assistant using voice commands on both Android and iOS. Speak your questions naturally and get instant AI-powered responses, making mobile productivity faster and more convenient. *available to all hubs and tiers

a-smarter-campaign-goals-experience.title: A smarter Campaign Goals experience
a-smarter-campaign-goals-experience.description: Introducing the Campaign Goals Tracker - a smarter way to set, track, and report on your campaigns! A redesigned and more intelligent approach to measuring campaign performance. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

healthy-unhealthy-lists-in-email-health.title: Healthy / Unhealthy Lists in Email Health
healthy-unhealthy-lists-in-email-health.description: You can now view a new report within the Email Health dashboard to surface the healthiest and unhealthiest performing recipient lists based on engagement metrics and deliverability. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

send-size-preview-with-exclusion-details.title: Send Size Preview with exclusion details
send-size-preview-with-exclusion-details.description: Send Size Preview shows an estimated recipient count before you send a marketing email. This feature now includes detailed reasons why certain contacts won't receive the email. *available to all hubs and tiers

unified-campaign-and-crm-tasks.title: Unified campaign and CRM tasks
unified-campaign-and-crm-tasks.description: Customers now have access to a unified task system in HubSpot. This means all tasks whether created in Marketing Hub tools or CRM are now in one place for better coordination. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

add-active-contact-lists-to-campaigns.title: Add active contact lists to campaigns
add-active-contact-lists-to-campaigns.description: Users can now add active contact lists to their campaigns - saving time, reducing manual work, and giving them more confidence in reaching the right audience. Lists automatically update as contacts *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

object-property-snapshots-for-event-data.title: Object Property Snapshots for Event Data
object-property-snapshots-for-event-data.description: HubSpot now automatically captures and stores key property values when events occur, giving you historical context for better reporting and analysis. This feature helps you understand how your data changes over time for more informed decisions. Learn More *available to all Marketing Hub Enterprise customers

enhancement-template-selection-in-landin.title: Enhancement: Template Selection in Landing Pages
enhancement-template-selection-in-landin.description: We have been working on a new, streamlined landing page creation flow to decrease drop-off and increase landing page creation success. The new template selection makes it easier to get started. *available to all hubs and tiers

domains-activity-log.title: Domains Activity Log
domains-activity-log.description: Users can now download a CSV file of their domain change and activity history from the past 90 days. This includes updates like domain additions, removals, and configuration changes for complete audit visibility. *available to all Content Hub Enterprise customers

improved-international-phone-number-form.title: Improved International Phone Number Formatting in Personalization Tokens
improved-international-phone-number-form.description: Phone number properties inserted as personalization tokens now display in a clearer international format with proper country codes and formatting for better readability. *available to all hubs and tiers

add-associations-to-deals-table-in-sales.title: Add Associations to Deals Table in Sales Workspace
add-associations-to-deals-table-in-sales.description: You can now add columns for several types of associations in the Sales Workspace deals table. Get insight into the associations between deals and contacts, companies, or custom objects. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ customers

call-from-other-devices-using-the-call-r.title: Call from other devices using the Call Remote
call-from-other-devices-using-the-call-r.description: Users can now use the call remote to make calls using an external device or the HubSpot mobile app. This update provides flexibility in how and where you make calls. *available to all Sales Hub Starter+ customers

sales-workspace-updates.title: Sales Workspace Updates
sales-workspace-updates.description: We've updated the sales workspace to integrate more seamlessly with the Smart CRM, making it easier for our customers to move between systems and focus on what matters most. This reduces context switching. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ customers

understand-lead-scoring-calculations-wit.title: Understand Lead Scoring Calculations with Improved "Test A Record"
understand-lead-scoring-calculations-wit.description: The Test a Record feature in Lead Scoring has been improved to provide customers a clearer view into how scores are calculated. This transparency helps you fine-tune your scoring model and ensure it aligns with your sales process for better lead prioritization. *available to all Sales & Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

today-s-insights-card.title: Today's Insights Card
today-s-insights-card.description: The new Today's Insights card in Help Desk workspace shows key trends in rep availability, ticket volume, and team performance. Make staffing decisions and identify issues proactively. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ Customers

close-date-automation-for-services.title: Close Date Automation for Services
close-date-automation-for-services.description: Close date automation is now available for service records. When you move a service to a closed stage in any service pipeline, the close date automatically updates, ensuring accurate reporting. *available to all hubs and tiers

board-view-for-customer-tab-in-customer-.title: Board view for customer tab in Customer Success Workspace
board-view-for-customer-tab-in-customer-.description: You can now view your customers in a board view (in addition to a list view) in the Customer Success Workspace. This visual approach helps CSMs track customer status and health at a glance. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ Customers

default-email-in-help-desk.title: Default email in help desk
default-email-in-help-desk.description: Default email allows admins to set a default email address by team in help desk. For many large multi team support orgs with many different email addresses, this saves time and prevents errors. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

help-desk-views-customization-experience.title: Help Desk Views Customization Experience and Improvements
help-desk-views-customization-experience.description: This set of updates unlocks more ways to customize and manage the views sidebar in the help desk. Via the new Views customization experience, create the perfect workflow for your team. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

average-nps-rating-and-customer-satisfac.title: Average NPS Rating and Customer Satisfaction Score CRM Cards
average-nps-rating-and-customer-satisfac.description: Two new CRM reporting cards integrate directly into Company and Contact record pages, displaying average Net Promoter Score and Customer Satisfaction ratings. Learn More *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

customize-inbound-recording-consent-mess.title: Customize Inbound Recording Consent Message
customize-inbound-recording-consent-mess.description: You can now completely customize the message that callers hear before they're connected to your reps and teams. This message informs callers about call recording and ensures compliance. *available to all Sales & Service Hub Pro+ customers

commerce-user-permissions-settings.title: Commerce User Permissions Settings
commerce-user-permissions-settings.description: You can now manage access to quotes, products, billing, and payments through Commerce permissions within Users and Teams. These settings were previously scattered - now they're centralized. *available to all hubs and tiers

respond-to-disputes-chargebacks-within-c.title: Respond to Disputes & Chargebacks within Commerce Hub
respond-to-disputes-chargebacks-within-c.description: Customers can now manage disputed payments directly within Commerce Hub using a new self service dispute resolution flow. Respond to chargebacks faster and track resolution status. *available to all hubs and tiers

append-buyer-email-to-payment-link-redir.title: Append Buyer Email to Payment Link Redirects
append-buyer-email-to-payment-link-redir.description: You can now append the buyer's email to your redirect URL in payment links. When someone completes a purchase, their email is automatically included in the redirect. *available to all hubs and tiers

job-title-in-contact-data-enrichment.title: Job title in Contact Data Enrichment
job-title-in-contact-data-enrichment.description: In addition to the role, sub-role, and seniority information that Breeze Intelligence previously provided, we now provide the job title as well for more complete contact enrichment. *available to all hubs and tiers

app-certification-status-renewal-policy-.title: App Certification Status & Renewal Policy Update
app-certification-status-renewal-policy-.description: This update introduces enhanced visual indicators for App Certification statuses in the developer portal, aligned with the new recertification policy. Under this policy, certified apps must renew their certification every two years to maintain their status, with clearer actionable status indicators throughout the lifecycle. *available to all app providers with listed apps in the HubSpot App Marketplace

additional-details-returned-when-generat.title: Additional details returned when generating OAuth access tokens
additional-details-returned-when-generat.description: New details are included in the response body for API POST requests made to the OAuth endpoint. This provides developers with more information for better integration management and debugging. *available to all hubs and tiers

bidirectional-associations-sync-for-sale.title: Bidirectional associations sync for Salesforce Tickets, Tasks, and custom objects
bidirectional-associations-sync-for-sale.description: HubSpot's integration with Salesforce already supports syncing object associations for standard objects, and now extends this to tickets, tasks, and custom objects for complete data synchronization. *available to all HubSpot Pro+ customers

marketplace-listing-editor-infrastructur.title: Marketplace Listing Editor Infrastructure Upgrade & Language Flexibility
marketplace-listing-editor-infrastructur.description: We're upgrading our listing editor's core infrastructure to deliver a smoother, more efficient experience. This update also introduces support for multiple languages in your marketplace listings. *available to all hubs and tiers

google-performance-max-ad-creation-and-e.title: Google Performance Max Ad Creation and Enhanced Reporting
google-performance-max-ad-creation-and-e.description: HubSpot users can now create and view more granular reporting on Google Performance Max ad campaigns right from HubSpot. This integration streamlines your advertising workflow and provides deeper insights. Learn More *available to all hubs and tiers

hubspot-connector-for-claude-additional-.title: HubSpot connector for Claude: Additional Object Access (Read-Only) and Admin Controls
hubspot-connector-for-claude-additional-.description: The HubSpot connector for Claude now supports read-only access to additional CRM objects and includes new admin controls for better governance. This expansion enables more sophisticated AI powered workflows while maintaining security and control. *available to all hubs and tiers

the-customer-agent-is-now-2x-smarter.title: The Customer Agent is now 2X smarter
the-customer-agent-is-now-2x-smarter.description: The Customer Agent now has enhanced reasoning skills that bring it even closer to human-level problem solving. It's not just about answering questions - it's about understanding context and providing thoughtful solutions. *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

assign-customer-agent-to-email.title: Assign Customer Agent to Email
assign-customer-agent-to-email.description: Businesses can now assign the Customer Agent to their Email accounts, streamlining support and lightening the load on human agents. For routine inquiries, let AI handle the response. *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

ai-powered-recommendations-in-automation.title: AI-Powered Recommendations in Automation Overview
ai-powered-recommendations-in-automation.description: You can now see AI-powered automation suggestions based on how your team uses HubSpot directly on the Automation Overview page. These recommendations help you discover new ways to save time and scale your operations. *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

edit-brand-information.title: Edit Brand Information
edit-brand-information.description: HubSpot now lets you customize your brand information used in AI tools. HubSpot's AI tools use brand information to provide helpful context for content generation, and now you have full control over how your brand is represented. *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

quick-fill-an-index-page-view-with-smart.title: Quick fill an index page view with smart properties
quick-fill-an-index-page-view-with-smart.description: You'll now be able to fill a view when you are creating a smart property, enabling you to more quickly start analyzing data. Skip the manual property selection and let AI suggest the most relevant fields. *available to all hubs and tiers

breeze-copilot-data-model-configuration.title: Breeze Copilot Data Model Configuration
breeze-copilot-data-model-configuration.description: Breeze Copilot can now help you configure your data model and answer questions about best practices. You don't need to worry about making mistakes - Copilot guides you through the right configuration. *available to all hubs and tiers

brand-identity-source-attribution.title: Brand Identity Source Attribution
brand-identity-source-attribution.description: HubSpot now shows users where their brand information comes from across different sources. Brand information is gathered from multiple sources like manual input, AI suggestions, and imported data - now you can see the origin of each element. *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

citations-in-smart-properties.title: Citations in Smart Properties
citations-in-smart-properties.description: Smart Properties now include citations that show where AI agents found data, the reasoning behind decisions, and the sources used for that data. This transparency builds trust and helps you verify AI generated information. *available to all hubs and tiers

shared-users-and-team-properties-on-addi.title: Shared Users and Team Properties on Additional Objects
shared-users-and-team-properties-on-addi.description: We're adding shared users and teams properties to the appointment, course, listing, and service objects. This enables better collaboration and visibility across your entire team. *available to all Hubspot Enterprise customers

rename-hubspot-defined-objects.title: Rename HubSpot Defined Objects
rename-hubspot-defined-objects.description: Admins can now configure the term they'd like to use in lieu of the HubSpot default for a particular object. For example, you might label deals as "opportunities" to match your team's terminology and reduce friction. *available to all hubs and tiers

new-forms-editor-reset-link-support.title: New Forms Editor: Reset Link Support
new-forms-editor-reset-link-support.description: When forms are pre-populated with known visitor data, it can lead to confusion or incorrect submissions. The reset link allows visitors to clear pre-filled data and start fresh. *available to all hubs and tiers

updated-limits-and-availability-for-cust.title: Updated Limits and Availability for Custom Tabs on CRM Record Pages
updated-limits-and-availability-for-cust.description: All HubSpot customers now have access to 10 custom tabs on CRM record pages. Custom tabs help organize related information and create focused experiences for different teams and use cases. *available to all hubs and tiers

multiple-conditions-for-rollup-propertie.title: Multiple Conditions for Rollup Properties
multiple-conditions-for-rollup-propertie.description: You can now apply multiple conditions to rollup-type calculated properties in HubSpot. This allows you to build smarter, more nuanced calculations that better reflect your business logic. *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

mirroring-company-data-across-multi-mana.title: Mirroring Company Data Across Multi-Management Accounts
mirroring-company-data-across-multi-mana.description: The Multi-Account Management data mirroring feature now supports mirroring the company object in addition to the contact object, enabling better data consistency across your entire business ecosystem.  Learn More *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

new-hubspot-numbers-available-in-nordics.title: New HubSpot Numbers Available in Nordics, France, Spain, and more!
new-hubspot-numbers-available-in-nordics.description: HubSpot phone number acquisition is now available in additional countries! Nordics (Norway, Sweden, Denmark), France, Spain, and more regions now have local number availability. *available to all Hubspot Starter+ customers

global-number-porting.title: Global Number Porting
global-number-porting.description: Porting is the process of transferring a phone number from one carrier to another. HubSpot is expanding the capability to port phone numbers globally to supported countries. Learn More *available to all Hubspot Starter+ customers

apply-activity-logging-defaults-to-exter.title: Apply Activity Logging Defaults to External Emails
apply-activity-logging-defaults-to-exter.description: Admin-configured email logging rules now apply consistently across all email channels. Previously, these rules only applied to emails sent from HubSpot - now external email clients follow the same rules. *available to all hubs and tiers

new-reporting-crm-cards-customer-lifetim.title: New Reporting CRM Cards: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) & Revenue Attribution
new-reporting-crm-cards-customer-lifetim.description: We're excited to introduce new CRM Reporting Cards: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) and Revenue Attribution. See revenue impact and customer value directly on contact and company records. Learn More *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

data-model-builder.title: Data Model Builder
data-model-builder.description: A new centralized data model configuration space. Within this space, admins can see their objects, create new ones and make association and property decisions in one streamlined experience that guides them through best practices. *available to all hubs and tiers

domain-settings-improvements.title: Domain Settings Improvements
domain-settings-improvements.description: We have made a number of improvements to domain settings management. Auto-associate new content types to domains, improved UI for better navigation, and clearer status indicators make domain management more intuitive and efficient. *available to all hubs and tiers

information-pop-over-for-events-and-memb.title: Information Pop-over for Events and Membership Filters
information-pop-over-for-events-and-memb.description: We've added information pop-overs for events and list memberships. These provide helpful context so customers can better understand and use these powerful filtering options without leaving their workflow. *available to all hubs and tiers

more-flexibility-in-property-field-type-.title: More Flexibility in Property Field Type Changes
more-flexibility-in-property-field-type-.description: You can now change certain custom property field types even when they're in use on reports, views, or record pages. This flexibility means you can evolve your data model without disrupting existing workflows. *available to all hubs and tiers

use-copilot-to-build-workflows.title: Use Copilot to Build Workflows
use-copilot-to-build-workflows.description: Copilot is now your go-to, AI-first workflow builder, that makes it easier than ever to create automation for any use case and benefit from the full potential of HubSpot's automation capabilities. Simply describe what you want in plain language and Copilot creates it for you. *available to all hubs and tiers

new-data-source-for-smart-properties-cal.title: New Data Source for Smart Properties: Call Transcripts
new-data-source-for-smart-properties-cal.description: You can now use call transcripts as a data source for smart properties. Important context is often shared during calls, and now that valuable information automatically populates your CRM properties, ensuring nothing falls through the cracks. *available to all Hubspot Starter+ customers

smart-properties-dynamic-variables-in-pr.title: Smart Properties: Dynamic Variables in Prompts
smart-properties-dynamic-variables-in-pr.description: You can now insert property tokens into your smart property prompts. These tokens let you reference existing property values directly, creating more personalized and context-aware automated properties that scale with your business needs. *available to all Hubspot Starter+ customers

send-form-submissions-from-excluded-ip-a.title: Send form submissions from excluded IP and referrers to spam
send-form-submissions-from-excluded-ip-a.description: With this update, all form submissions from excluded IPs and referrers will be treated as spam and will be sent to the spam folder automatically, keeping your data clean without manual intervention. *available to all hubs and tiers

meta-changing-whatsapp-conversation-pric.title: Meta Changing WhatsApp Conversation Pricing Effective July 1
meta-changing-whatsapp-conversation-pric.description: HubSpot has aligned with Meta's new WhatsApp pricing model that changes the unit of measure for conversations. You'll need to review your messaging costs to ensure budget alignment with the new structure. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

manage-video-captions-in-social-editor.title: Manage Video Captions in Social Editor
manage-video-captions-in-social-editor.description: A new Manage Captions button lets you view, edit, and control video captions before publishing social posts. This ensures accessibility and helps you reach broader audiences, including viewers watching without sound. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

undo-redo-buttons-added-in-the-social-co.title: Undo/Redo Buttons added in the Social Composer
undo-redo-buttons-added-in-the-social-co.description: New undo and redo buttons have been added to the Social Composer. You can quickly restore accidentally deleted content or revert unwanted changes, speeding up your content creation workflow. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

add-external-social-posts-to-a-campaign.title: Add External Social Posts to a Campaign
add-external-social-posts-to-a-campaign.description: External social posts created outside HubSpot can now be added to your campaigns. This provides a unified view of all social efforts for better performance tracking and ROI measurement. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

faster-email-client-testing.title: Faster Email Client Testing
faster-email-client-testing.description: Preview your emails instantly within a new UI across 100+ email clients including Gmail, Outlook, and Apple Mail. This faster testing process helps you catch rendering issues before sending, improving email deliverability and appearance. Learn More *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

ad-conversion-events-available-to-starte.title: Ad Conversion Events Available to Starter
ad-conversion-events-available-to-starte.description: Marketing Hub Starter users can now create up to 5 ad conversion events directly from their portal. These events optimize ad delivery by sending conversion data back to ad platforms for better targeting and performance. *available to all Marketing Hub Starter+ customers

ip-derived-visitor-country-segmentation-.title: IP-derived Visitor Country Segmentation in Buyer Intent
ip-derived-visitor-country-segmentation-.description: You can now filter and segment companies in Buyer Intent based on the country their visitors are coming from. This geographic insight helps you prioritize outreach to companies showing interest from specific regions and tailor your sales approach accordingly. *available to all hubs and tiers A dedicated video library centralizes and simplifies your video content workflows, separate from the general files manager. This specialized app provides video-specific features and organization that help yo

export-from-descript.title: Export from Descript
export-from-descript.description: You can now export videos directly from Descript into HubSpot, streamlining your content creation workflow. This integration eliminates the need to download and re-upload files, saving time in your video marketing process. *available to all hubs and tiers

access-ai-powered-video-marketing-app-fr.title: Access AI-Powered Video Marketing App from Pages
access-ai-powered-video-marketing-app-fr.description: The AI-powered video marketing app is now accessible directly from landing pages. You can create more engaging experiences that capture visitor attention and improve conversions without switching tools. *available to all Marketing, Content, and Service Hub Pro+ customers

enhanced-deals-sidebar-experience.title: Enhanced Deals Sidebar Experience
enhanced-deals-sidebar-experience.description: The deals sidebar has been redesigned with a two-column layout showing comprehensive deal information alongside activities. This helps you make informed decisions quickly while maintaining context during customer interactions. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ customers

manually-score-deals-and-companies-with-.title: Manually Score Deals and Companies with Sales Hub
manually-score-deals-and-companies-with-.description: The Lead Scoring app now supports manual scoring of deals and companies. You can assign custom scores based on qualitative factors to ensure your team focuses on the most strategic opportunities. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ customers

edit-email-conversation-history-in-help-.title: Edit Email Conversation History in Help Desk and Inbox
edit-email-conversation-history-in-help-.description: Email conversation history is now visible and editable when composing replies. You can remove unnecessary quoted text or sensitive information to create more professional customer communications. *available to all hubs and tiers

user-based-ticket-capacity-limits-by-tic.title: User-based Ticket Capacity Limits by Ticket Type
user-based-ticket-capacity-limits-by-tic.description: Service managers can now set individual limits for open tickets by type (calling, messaging, email) per user. This helps balance workloads and prevent agent burnout while maintaining service quality standards. *available to all Service Hub Enterprise customers

delta-changes-on-the-help-desk-summary-t.title: Delta Changes on the Help Desk Summary Tab
delta-changes-on-the-help-desk-summary-t.description: Time comparison features with delta indicators have been added to all Help Desk Summary metrics. You can track performance improvements and quickly identify negative trends across different time periods. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

gain-deeper-insights-into-your-help-desk.title: Gain Deeper Insights into Your Help Desk Summary Tab Metrics
gain-deeper-insights-into-your-help-desk.description: Metrics on the Help Desk Summary Tab now link directly to relevant Help Desk views. You get instant context and can troubleshoot support performance issues faster by drilling into specific data. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

never-log-overrides-existing-contacts-fo.title: Never Log Overrides Existing Contacts for Inbox and Help Desk Email
never-log-overrides-existing-contacts-fo.description: The Never Log list now prevents email engagements from being created when team email addresses contact those on the list. This keeps your contact records clean and focused on actual customer interactions. *available to all hubs and tiers

ticket-routing-engine-update-to-balanced.title: Ticket Routing Engine: Update to Balanced Distribution and Active Call Assignment
ticket-routing-engine-update-to-balanced.description: The balanced distribution model now considers all open tickets when routing, not just recent assignments. This improvement ensures truly balanced workloads across your support team and prevents any agent from being overwhelmed. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

mobile-inbound-calling.title: Mobile Inbound Calling
mobile-inbound-calling.description: Incoming calls to your HubSpot number can now be answered directly from the mobile app. You receive instant caller information and full call logging, ensuring you never miss critical opportunities while away from your desk. Learn More *available to all Sales Hub and Service Hub Starter+ customers

custom-and-default-net-payment-terms-on-.title: Custom and Default Net Payment Terms on Invoices
custom-and-default-net-payment-terms-on-.description: You can now set custom net payment terms and establish company-wide defaults for invoices. This standardizes payment expectations like Net 30 while maintaining flexibility for special client agreements. *available to all hubs and tiers
