hubspot-payments-available-in-canada.title: HubSpot Payments Available in Canada
hubspot-payments-available-in-canada.description: HubSpot payments is now available to Canadian customers, allowing direct payment collection within HubSpot. This expansion brings integrated payment processing to Canadian businesses, eliminating the need for third-party payment solutions. *available to all Commerce Hub Starter+ customers

switch-to-hubspot-payments-from-stripe-p.title: Switch to HubSpot Payments from Stripe Payment Processing
switch-to-hubspot-payments-from-stripe-p.description: Commerce Hub customers using Stripe can now easily switch to HubSpot payments directly from the Payments Account settings. This seamless transition lets you consolidate payment processing within HubSpot for better data integration and simplified operations. *available to all Commerce Hub Starter+ customers

campaigns-api-improvements-feature-expan.title: Campaigns API Improvements: Feature Expansion & New Endpoints
campaigns-api-improvements-feature-expan.description: New functionalities and endpoints have been added to the Campaigns Public API. This enables you to build sophisticated integrations with custom reporting dashboards and deeper automation. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

campaigns-api-improvements-scope-enhance.title: Campaigns API Improvements: Scope Enhancement & Property Deprecation
campaigns-api-improvements-scope-enhance.description: The Campaigns API now features enhanced scopes and updated property structures. Your integrations can access campaign data more efficiently while maintaining compatibility with cleaner APIs. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

add-deal-collaborators-from-a-workflow-v.title: Add Deal Collaborators from a Workflow & via API
add-deal-collaborators-from-a-workflow-v.description: You can now set and update Deal Collaborators through workflows and the CRM API. This automation capability ensures the right team members are notified and involved based on deal progression or other triggers. *available to all hubs and tiers

app-insights-portal-and-trends-data.title: App Insights: Portal and Trends Data
app-insights-portal-and-trends-data.description: App partners can now view daily, weekly, and monthly API usage trends for selected operations. This helps you optimize application performance and scale effectively with customer growth. *available to all hubs and tiers

shopify-app-update-revenue-reporting-for.title: Shopify App Update: Revenue Reporting for Orders
shopify-app-update-revenue-reporting-for.description: The Shopify Data Sync app now tracks revenue from orders generated through marketing assets. This new reporting capability helps you measure ROI and optimize your e-commerce marketing strategies. *available to all Marketing Hub Enterprise customers

77-new-and-15-featured-updated-apps-in-t.title: 77+ new and 15+ featured updated apps in the HubSpot Marketplace
77-new-and-15-featured-updated-apps-in-t.description: The HubSpot Marketplace added 77+ new apps and featured 15+ updated apps including major platforms like Shopify. This expansion provides more integration options and enhanced functionality for extending HubSpot's capabilities. *available to all hubs and tiers

unify-buyer-insights-in-your-deal-record.title: Unify Buyer Insights in Your Deal Records with the Trumpet App for HubSpot
unify-buyer-insights-in-your-deal-record.description: The improved Trumpet app for HubSpot now unifies buyer insights from Trumpet's personalized digital sales rooms directly in your deal records. This centralized view helps you understand buyer engagement and tailor your approach accordingly. *available to all hubs and tiers

change-or-disconnect-properties-on-forms.title: Change or Disconnect Properties on Forms
change-or-disconnect-properties-on-forms.description: Form fields can now be disconnected from CRM properties or reconnected to different ones without rebuilding. This saves significant time during form optimization and helps you adapt quickly to changing data needs. *available to all hubs and tiers

security-settings-redesign.title: Security Settings Redesign
security-settings-redesign.description: The Security settings page has been reorganized into three clear tabs: Login, Permissions, and Sensitive Data. This new structure helps you navigate security configurations more efficiently and manage access controls faster. *available to all hubs and tiers

create-multi-select-user-properties.title: Create Multi-Select User Properties
create-multi-select-user-properties.description: HubSpot User properties can now be configured as multi-select fields. This allows you to track multiple team members on deals or projects in a single property field. *available to all hubs and tiers A new URL property type has been introduced for storing web addresses. This ensures proper formatting and validation while enabling direct clickable links from record pages. *available to all hubs and tiers

basic-record-cloning.title: Basic Record Cloning
basic-record-cloning.description: You can now create new records by cloning existing ones with their properties and associations. This saves time when creating similar deals, tickets, or custom objects that share common attributes. *available to all hubs and tiers

configure-activity-association-defaults-.title: Configure Activity Association Defaults for Additional Objects
configure-activity-association-defaults-.description: Automatic association rules for emails, calls, and meetings now extend to additional CRM objects. This improves data accuracy by ensuring activities are properly linked without manual intervention. Learn More *available to all hubs and tiers

automated-scheduling-for-backups.title: Automated Scheduling for Backups
automated-scheduling-for-backups.description: CRM data backups can now be scheduled to run automatically weekly or bi-weekly. This protects your critical business information without manual intervention while maintaining compliance requirements. *available to all HubSpot Enterprise customers

send-dns-setup-records-for-web-content-t.title: Send DNS Setup Records for Web Content to a Colleague
send-dns-setup-records-for-web-content-t.description: A new feature lets you send DNS setup links directly to IT team members or webmasters. This streamlines technical configuration and reduces back-and-forth communication about DNS requirements. *available to all hubs and tiers

share-feedback-on-betas.title: Share Feedback on Betas
share-feedback-on-betas.description: You can now submit feedback for beta features and live updates directly from the Product Updates page. This direct channel ensures your team's needs are considered in HubSpot's product development. *available to all hubs and tiers

lists-filter-by-used-in-channel.title: Lists - Filter by Used In Channel
lists-filter-by-used-in-channel.description: You can now filter lists on the List Index page based on where they're used across HubSpot. This helps you safely manage your database without accidentally affecting active workflows or campaigns. *available to all hubs and tiers

create-campaign-and-list-calculated-prop.title: Create Campaign and List Calculated Properties
create-campaign-and-list-calculated-prop.description: You can now create calculated properties for Campaign and List objects that automatically compute values. This enables advanced reporting and segmentation based on dynamic calculations rather than static values. *available to all HubSpot Pro+ customers

duplicate-file-notification-and-removal.title: Duplicate File Notification and Removal
duplicate-file-notification-and-removal.description: File deduplication alerts you when uploading files that already exist in your HubSpot account. This prevents duplicate uploads, saves storage space, and keeps your file manager organized without manual cleanup. *available to all hubs and tiers

association-limit-increase.title: Association Limit Increase
association-limit-increase.description: Paid accounts can now associate individual records with up to 100,000 other records, a significant increase from previous limits. This expanded capability supports complex business relationships and comprehensive data connections. *available to all HubSpot Starter+ customers

enhancements-to-options-formatting-in-pr.title: Enhancements to Options Formatting in Property Export File
enhancements-to-options-formatting-in-pr.description: Property options now display in a simplified, readable format in export files. This improvement makes it easier to review and share property configurations with team members or external consultants. *available to all hubs and tiers

conditional-display-logic-on-all-crm-car.title: Conditional Display Logic on All CRM Cards, Locations, and Tabs
conditional-display-logic-on-all-crm-car.description: Super Admins can now control which CRM cards and tabs are visible based on property values across all locations. This creates cleaner, more relevant interfaces by showing only the information users need based on record context. *available to all hubs and tiers

property-export-file-now-includes-last-u.title: Property Export File Now Includes Last Updated Time and Source
property-export-file-now-includes-last-u.description: Property export files now include Last Updated Time and Source columns for better tracking. This additional metadata helps you understand when properties were modified and what triggered the changes. *available to all hubs and tiers

appointment-name-property-required-for-r.title: Appointment Name Property Required for Record Creation
appointment-name-property-required-for-r.description: The appointment name field is now required when creating appointment records in HubSpot. This ensures better data quality and makes it easier to identify and track appointments across your system. *available to all hubs and tiers

association-configuration-changes-are-in.title: Association Configuration Changes are Included in the Audit Log
association-configuration-changes-are-in.description: You can now view changes to association configurations in the Audit Log, including new associations, updates, and deletions. This enhanced tracking provides better visibility into system changes for compliance and troubleshooting. *available to all hubs and tiers

bulk-actions-in-smart-properties.title: Bulk Actions in Smart Properties
bulk-actions-in-smart-properties.description: Smart properties can now be filled with data in much larger ways, allowing you to fill entire lists or filtered views in a click. This bulk capability saves hours of manual data entry while enriching your CRM with valuable insights. *available to all hubs and tiers

copilot-social-quick-replies-mobile.title: Copilot Social Quick Replies Mobile
copilot-social-quick-replies-mobile.description: You can now respond to social comments and messages on-the-go with AI-suggested replies. This mobile-first approach ensures you never miss an opportunity to engage with your audience, even when away from your desk. *available to all Marketing Hub Enterprise customers

making-hashtag-management-easier-new-has.title: Making Hashtag management easier: New Hashtag Bank in the Social Editor
making-hashtag-management-easier-new-has.description: Save your most effective hashtag combinations and apply them with one click. This new feature eliminates repetitive typing and ensures consistent hashtag strategies across all your social campaigns. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

smart-frequency-suggestions-and-score-ev.title: Smart Frequency Suggestions and Score 'Event Not Occurred' in Scoring Apps
smart-frequency-suggestions-and-score-ev.description: AI-powered suggestions help you build more accurate lead scoring models faster. Combined with negative scoring for missed actions, you can now create sophisticated models that truly reflect buyer readiness. *available to all Marketing and Service Hub Pro+ customers

rich-text-formatting-for-labels-and-data.title: Rich Text Formatting for Labels and Data Privacy Text
rich-text-formatting-for-labels-and-data.description: Rich text formatting including bold, italic, underline, hyperlinks, and color is now available for labels and help text, with data privacy text supporting all formatting except color. You can now emphasize critical information and match your brand guidelines while ensuring important details like compliance requirements stand out.*available to all hubs and tiers

view-marketing-event-participation-with-.title: View Marketing Event Participation with the Registrant Card
view-marketing-event-participation-with-.description: See complete event registration and attendance history directly within contact records. You'll have valuable context for personalized follow-ups, understanding which events influenced each prospect's journey. *available to all hubs and tiers

sync-custom-lifecycle-stages-with-facebo.title: Sync custom lifecycle stages with Facebook ads for better targeting
sync-custom-lifecycle-stages-with-facebo.description: Your custom lifecycle stages from HubSpot now sync directly to Facebook's Conversions API, enabling Facebook to understand and optimize around your unique customer journey stages beyond standard lifecycle phases. You'll achieve more precise ad targeting and lower costs per action because Facebook's algorithm can now learn from your specific business milestones. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

automatically-add-video-captions-to-yout.title: Automatically Add Video Captions to YouTube
automatically-add-video-captions-to-yout.description: While YouTube auto-generates captions, their accuracy often falls short. HubSpot's AI-generated captions offer significantly better precision and readability, improving accessibility, engagement, and cross-platform performance. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

lists-shared-records-support.title: Lists - Shared Records Support
lists-shared-records-support.description: Team lists now include both owned records and those shared with the team. You'll see complete team responsibilities in one view, ensuring collaborative teams don't miss important shared records. *available to all Hubspot Enterprise customers

automatically-send-video-captions-to-x-f.title: Automatically Send Video Captions to X (formerly Twitter)
automatically-send-video-captions-to-x-f.description: You can now automatically add captions to your social videos using AI-generated captions or by uploading your own. HubSpot will include these captions when posting videos to X (formerly Twitter), improving accessibility and engagement. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

average-email-open-rate-and-click-throug.title: Average Email Open Rate and Click Through Rate for Lists
average-email-open-rate-and-click-throug.description: View engagement metrics aggregated at the list level to quickly identify your most and least responsive segments. You'll make smarter segmentation decisions by understanding which audiences consistently engage with your content versus those that need different approaches. *available to all hubs and tiers

scale-email-and-form-scoring-with-contai.title: Scale Email and Form Scoring with "Contains" in Scoring Apps
scale-email-and-form-scoring-with-contai.description: Use "contains" filters to automatically include multiple emails and forms in your scoring rules based on naming patterns. You'll save hours of manual configuration while ensuring new assets automatically contribute to lead scores when they match your criteria. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

associate-ads-to-hubspot-campaigns-from-.title: Associate Ads to HubSpot Campaigns from the Ads Tool
associate-ads-to-hubspot-campaigns-from-.description: Connect your advertising campaigns to HubSpot campaigns directly within the ads tool interface. You'll streamline campaign tracking and attribution by linking paid efforts to broader marketing initiatives without switching between tools. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

send-video-transcripts-to-facebook.title: Send Video Transcripts to Facebook
send-video-transcripts-to-facebook.description: Automatically add AI-generated or custom captions when posting videos to Facebook from HubSpot. You'll reach more viewers who watch without sound while improving accessibility, ensuring your message gets across regardless of how people consume your content. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

view-audit-logs-for-updates-to-double-op.title: View Audit Logs for Updates to Double Opt-In Settings
view-audit-logs-for-updates-to-double-op.description: Track all changes to your Double Opt-In (DOI) email settings through comprehensive audit logs. You'll maintain complete visibility into compliance-critical settings, knowing exactly who made changes and when, ensuring your email practices stay legally compliant. *available to all Marketing Hub Enterprise customers

customize-hubspot-marketing-emails-with-.title: Customize HubSpot Marketing Emails with Recently Viewed Shopify Products
customize-hubspot-marketing-emails-with-.description: Personalize emails by including products that individual contacts recently viewed in your Shopify store. You'll create highly relevant shopping experiences that pick up right where customers left off, dramatically increasing the likelihood of conversion. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

customize-hubspot-marketing-emails-with-.title: Customize HubSpot Marketing Emails with Most Viewed Shopify Products
customize-hubspot-marketing-emails-with-.description: Your marketing emails can now dynamically pull in the most viewed products from your Shopify store. You'll automatically showcase trending items that have proven customer interest, keeping your email content fresh and relevant without manual updates. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

combined-scores-available-for-marketing-.title: Combined Scores Available for Marketing Hub Professional
combined-scores-available-for-marketing-.description: You can now create unified lead scores that evaluate both contacts and companies in Marketing Hub Professional, previously an Enterprise-only feature. This combined scoring approach gives you a more complete picture of sales-readiness by considering both individual engagement and company-level buying signals in one comprehensive score. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

podcast-slide-in-cta-template.title: Podcast Slide-in CTA Template
podcast-slide-in-cta-template.description: Use a purpose-built CTA template designed specifically for promoting podcast episodes on your website. You'll grow your podcast audience by surfacing relevant episodes to visitors based on their interests and browsing behavior. *available to all Content Hub Pro+ customers

automatically-enhance-prompts-for-ai-pow.title: Automatically Enhance Prompts for AI-Powered Landing Pages
automatically-enhance-prompts-for-ai-pow.description: Click "Enhance" to automatically improve your landing page descriptions with AI-powered suggestions. You'll transform basic ideas into compelling, conversion-focused copy without needing professional copywriting skills, ensuring every landing page uses persuasive language that drives action. *available to all Content Hub Pro+ customers

add-additional-context-for-ai-powered-la.title: Add Additional Context for AI-Powered Landing Pages
add-additional-context-for-ai-powered-la.description: The content agent now accepts additional context and details when creating landing pages for products and events. You'll get more personalized, on-brand results that better match your campaign goals because the AI understands your specific requirements and can incorporate your unique value propositions. *available to all Content Hub Pro+ customers Marketing & Content Hub

thumbnails-for-pdfs.title: Thumbnails for PDFs
thumbnails-for-pdfs.description: PDF thumbnails now display automatically in your file manager, making it easier to find the right document instantly. This visual preview eliminates the guesswork when browsing through multiple PDFs in your content library. *available to all hubs and tiers

custom-times-and-prevent-skip-for-forms-.title: Custom Times and “Prevent Skip” for Forms/CTAs Now in Professional
custom-times-and-prevent-skip-for-forms-.description: Professional tier customers can now set custom timing and prevent skipping for forms and CTAs. You'll create more sophisticated engagement experiences with precise control over when and how visitors interact with your conversion tools. *available to all Marketing, Content, and Service Pro+ customers

deal-metrics-customization.title: Deal Metrics Customization
deal-metrics-customization.description: Customize your deal dashboard to show exactly the metrics you need to track sales performance. This personalization ensures every sales rep sees the most relevant data for their specific role and goals. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ customers

sales-workspace-dashboards.title: Sales Workspace Dashboards
sales-workspace-dashboards.description: Access your most important sales metrics without switching tabs or leaving your workspace. This embedded dashboard feature keeps your team focused on selling while staying informed about performance in real-time. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ customers

multiple-domain-support-for-buyer-intent.title: Multiple Domain Support for Buyer Intent
multiple-domain-support-for-buyer-intent.description: Track buyer intent signals across all your domains from a single dashboard. This multi-domain visibility helps you understand the complete buyer journey, regardless of which website prospects visit first. *available to Sales Hub Professional+

auto-add-backfill-for-buyer-intent.title: Auto-add Backfill for Buyer Intent
auto-add-backfill-for-buyer-intent.description: Retroactively add historical high-intent visitors to your CRM with our new backfill capability. This feature ensures you don't miss opportunities from past website visits that match your current intent criteria. *available to all hubs and tiers

multiple-intent-criteria-for-buyer-inten.title: Multiple Intent Criteria for Buyer Intent
multiple-intent-criteria-for-buyer-inten.description: Create multiple intent profiles to identify different buyer personas and stages in the sales cycle. This granular approach helps you spot and respond to various buying signals with tailored outreach *available to all hubs and tiers

sales-workspace-daily-digest-email.title: Sales Workspace Daily Digest Email
sales-workspace-daily-digest-email.description: Start each morning with a personalized email highlighting your most important sales actions for the day. You'll never miss critical follow-ups or deal milestones because everything requiring attention is summarized in one convenient daily briefing. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ customers

browse-search-knowledge-base-in-the-widg.title: Browse & Search Knowledge Base in the Widget
browse-search-knowledge-base-in-the-widg.description: Your customers can now find answers instantly within the chat widget itself. This seamless integration reduces support tickets by empowering customers to self-serve while maintaining the option to chat when needed. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

predictive-insights-time-in-ticket-statu.title: Predictive Insights & Time in Ticket Status Reporting on the Help Desk Analyze Tab
predictive-insights-time-in-ticket-statu.description: AI-powered predictions now highlight potential issues before they become problems in your support queue. This proactive intelligence helps you allocate resources effectively and maintain consistent service levels. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

filter-tickets-by-associated-contact-and.title: Filter Tickets by Associated Contact and Company in Help Desk
filter-tickets-by-associated-contact-and.description: Quickly filter support tickets by customer or company to see complete support history at a glance. This targeted view helps agents provide more personalized support by understanding the full context of customer interactions. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

embedded-dashboards-in-customer-success-.title: Embedded Dashboards in Customer Success Workspace
embedded-dashboards-in-customer-success-.description: View customer health scores and success metrics without leaving your workspace. This integrated approach keeps customer success managers focused on their accounts while monitoring key performance indicators in real-time. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

big-boosts-to-the-customer-agent-s-respo.title: Big Boosts to the Customer Agent's Response Quality
big-boosts-to-the-customer-agent-s-respo.description: Significant improvements help the Customer Agent deliver faster, clearer, and more accurate automated responses. You'll handle more inquiries automatically with responses that better understand context and nuance, freeing your team for complex issues. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

export-tickets-in-the-customer-portal.title: Export Tickets in the Customer Portal
export-tickets-in-the-customer-portal.description: Customers can now export their support ticket history to CSV with one click. You'll reduce support burden by enabling self-service data access, while customers get the records they need for compliance or internal reporting. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

health-score-builder.title: Health Score Builder
health-score-builder.description: Build custom health scores by assigning points to any property or activity across HubSpot. You'll proactively identify at-risk accounts and expansion opportunities by creating scoring models that reflect what truly indicates customer health in your business. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

design-changes-in-the-customer-portal.title: Design Changes in the Customer Portal
design-changes-in-the-customer-portal.description: Behind-the-scenes improvements deliver a sleeker, more modern Customer Portal experience. Your customers will enjoy a more intuitive interface that makes finding support resources and managing tickets easier, strengthening their relationship with your brand. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

copy-call-transcript-to-clipboard.title: Copy Call Transcript to Clipboard
copy-call-transcript-to-clipboard.description: Copy entire call transcripts with one click for analysis or sharing. You'll easily capture conversations for coaching, quality reviews, or team collaboration without tedious manual copying. *available to all Sales Hub and Service Hub Starter+ customers

dismiss-knowledge-gap-topics-messages.title: Dismiss Knowledge Gap Topics & Messages
dismiss-knowledge-gap-topics-messages.description: Clean up Customer Agent knowledge gaps by dismissing irrelevant "I don't know" responses. You'll focus improvement efforts on genuine content needs rather than false positives, ensuring training time creates real value for customers. *available to all Sales Hub and Service Hub Pro+ customers

updated-calling-remote.title: Updated Calling Remote
updated-calling-remote.description: The enhanced calling remote now lets you take notes and track outcomes without leaving your active call. You'll capture important details in real-time while maintaining conversation flow, eliminating the need to update records after hanging up. *available to all Sales Hub and Service Hub Starter+ customers

schedule-automatic-exchange-rate-updates.title: Schedule Automatic Exchange Rate Updates
schedule-automatic-exchange-rate-updates.description: Automate currency exchange rate updates on monthly, quarterly, or annual schedules. You'll maintain accurate multi-currency deal values and reporting without manual intervention, saving hours of administrative work while preventing pricing errors. *available to all Hubspot Starter+ customers

chargeback-and-dispute-visibility-for-pa.title: Chargeback and Dispute Visibility for Payments
chargeback-and-dispute-visibility-for-pa.description: Receive automatic notifications at every stage of payment disputes with full visibility. You'll protect revenue by never missing dispute deadlines, with complete tracking from initial filing through resolution. *available to all hubs and tiers

updated-commerce-hub-payments-api.title: Updated Commerce Hub Payments API
updated-commerce-hub-payments-api.description: The enhanced API enables programmatic creation and management of payment records. You'll integrate payment systems more deeply with HubSpot, automating data flow between your commerce and CRM systems. *available to all hubs and tiers

shopify-app-update-ecommerce-customer-cr.title: Shopify app update: Ecommerce customer CRM card
shopify-app-update-ecommerce-customer-cr.description: See complete Shopify customer data directly in HubSpot contact records. This unified view helps your team deliver personalized experiences based on actual purchase history and shopping behavior. *available to all hubs and tiers

zapier-app-custom-objects-for-associatio.title: Zapier app: Custom objects for associations
zapier-app-custom-objects-for-associatio.description: The Zapier app for HubSpot now supports associations with custom objects, extending beyond the previous limitations of only working with standard CRM objects. You can now build powerful cross-system automations that leverage your unique business data structures, creating workflows that connect your custom objects to thousands of other apps. *available to all hubs and tiers

active-installs-in-marketplace-analytics.title: Active Installs in Marketplace Analytics
active-installs-in-marketplace-analytics.description: Track real-time active installations of your marketplace apps with new analytics reports. You'll monitor adoption trends and user retention, making informed decisions about feature development and support resources. *available to all hubs and tiers

hubspot-deep-research-connector.title: HubSpot deep research connector
hubspot-deep-research-connector.description: Unlock PhD-level insights from your CRM data using advanced AI research capabilities. This groundbreaking integration transforms how you analyze customer data and uncover hidden opportunities. *available to all Hubspot Enterprise customers

automated-inactive-user-deactivation.title: Automated Inactive User Deactivation
automated-inactive-user-deactivation.description: Automated Inactive User Deactivation automatically removes users who haven't logged in for a specified period on a monthly basis, eliminating the security risks of dormant accounts. You'll protect your HubSpot data from potential breaches while saving hours of manual user management. *available to all Hubspot Starter+ customers

update-to-appointment-object.title: Update to Appointment Object
update-to-appointment-object.description: A new "appointment name" property helps you give meetings meaningful, searchable titles. You'll quickly identify appointment purposes at a glance, improving calendar management and reducing scheduling confusion. *available to all hubs and tiers

sticky-tabs-for-crm-records.title: Sticky Tabs for CRM Records
sticky-tabs-for-crm-records.description: CRM record tabs now stay fixed at the top of your screen while scrolling. You'll switch between record sections instantly without scrolling back up, saving countless clicks throughout your day. *available to all hubs and tiers

view-permission-for-buyer-intent.title: View Permission for Buyer Intent
view-permission-for-buyer-intent.description: Control buyer intent visibility with granular view permissions separate from editing rights. You'll ensure sensitive buying signals are only visible to appropriate team members while maintaining data security across your sales organization. *available to all hubs and tiers

restrict-access-to-a-single-account.title: Restrict Access to a Single Account
restrict-access-to-a-single-account.description: Prevent users from being added to multiple HubSpot accounts for enhanced security. You'll ensure sensitive business data stays within your organization by controlling where team members can access HubSpot. *available to all hubs and tiers

improved-card-library-for-crm-customizat.title: Improved Card Library for CRM Customization
improved-card-library-for-crm-customizat.description: The new Card Library provides an engaging visual interface for discovering and managing CRM cards. You'll build the perfect CRM layout faster by browsing available customizations visually, without needing technical expertise. *available to all hubs and tiers

native-table-reports-on-ios.title: Native Table Reports on iOS
native-table-reports-on-ios.description: Fully native table reports on iOS eliminate text cutoffs and formatting issues. You'll analyze data effectively on your iPhone with desktop-quality reporting that actually works on mobile devices. *available to all hubs and tiers

conditional-properties-and-required-asso.title: Conditional properties and required associations when creating Contacts & Companies on iOS and Android
conditional-properties-and-required-asso.description: Create smarter mobile forms with conditional logic and required associations on iOS devices. You'll ensure field teams collect all necessary information with intelligent forms that adapt based on their inputs. *available to all hubs and tiers

breeze-customer-agent-now-available-acro.title: Breeze Customer Agent: Now Available Across All Pro+ Hubs
breeze-customer-agent-now-available-acro.description: Breeze Customer Agent is no longer limited to Service Hub - it's now available across your entire HubSpot platform. This expansion lets every team leverage AI to handle customer conversations intelligently. *available to all HubSpot Pro+ customers

temporarily-pause-breeze-customer-agent.title: Temporarily Pause Breeze Customer Agent
temporarily-pause-breeze-customer-agent.description: Take control of when Breeze Customer Agent is active with our new pause feature. This flexibility ensures human agents can take over during critical periods or when specialized support is needed. *available to all HubSpot Pro+ customers

breeze-suggested-properties-in-report-fi.title: Breeze Suggested Properties in Report Filters
breeze-suggested-properties-in-report-fi.description: Breeze AI suggests relevant properties when creating report filters based on your usage patterns. You'll discover valuable data points you might have overlooked, building more insightful reports with intelligent assistance. *available to all HubSpot Starter+ customers

dynamic-dates-in-lists-and-workflows.title: Dynamic Dates in Lists and Workflows
dynamic-dates-in-lists-and-workflows.description: Dynamic date tokens were previously limited, but now they’re supported in more tools. You can build smarter automation and better-targeted lists without the hassle of constant updates. *available to all hubs and tiers

manage-view-and-edit-property-access-in-.title: Manage View and Edit Property Access in Workflows
manage-view-and-edit-property-access-in-.description: Previously, property access had to be managed outside of workflows, leading to administrative overhead. Now, integrated access controls make workflows more secure and easier to govern—all from a single place within HubSpot. *available to all Hubspot Enterprise customers

additional-wait-until-activity-events-in.title: Additional Wait Until Activity events in Journey Automation
additional-wait-until-activity-events-in.description: Previously, Journey Automation had limited ‘Wait until’ conditions, restricting your ability to respond to user behaviors. With new supported events, you can wait for more meaningful interactions, making journeys smarter and improving customer satisfaction. *available to all Marketing Hub Enterprise customers

track-subscription-type-changes-in-the-a.title: Track subscription type changes in the Audit Log
track-subscription-type-changes-in-the-a.description: Subscription type actions now appear in the Audit Log, closing a major visibility gap. This enables more secure and traceable updates to communication preferences, helping your team maintain full control over subscription management. *available to all Marketing Hub Enterprise customers

manage-workflow-metrics-in-workflow-sett.title: Manage Workflow Metrics in Workflow Settings
manage-workflow-metrics-in-workflow-sett.description: The Settings tab now allows you to select key metrics to display, a feature previously missing in workflow analytics. This gives teams cleaner dashboards, faster insights, and the ability to focus on high-impact performance signals. *available to all Marketing Hub Enterprise customers

send-video-transcripts-to-linkedin.title: Send Video Transcripts to LinkedIn
send-video-transcripts-to-linkedin.description: Previously, video transcripts weren’t automatically included in LinkedIn posts via HubSpot. This change removes a manual step and ensures more complete, accessible social content, helping your videos perform better and reach wider audiences. *available to all Marketing Hub Pro+ customers

url-partitioning-for-shareable-forms-in-.title: URL Partitioning for Shareable Forms in the new Forms Editor
url-partitioning-for-shareable-forms-in-.description: Previously, marketers had to create separate forms or rely on external tools to manage and track source-specific submissions. This update simplifies attribution and segmentation by embedding tracking right into shareable form links from the new editor. *available to all hubs and tiers

clone-a-journey-in-journey-automation.title: Clone a journey in Journey Automation
clone-a-journey-in-journey-automation.description: This feature introduces one-click duplication for complex, multi-step customer journeys. It enhances your ability to scale programs, standardize experiences, and maintain quality control across variations. *available to all Marketing Hub Enterprise customers

ai-generated-captions-caption-translatio.title: AI-Generated Captions & Caption Translations
ai-generated-captions-caption-translatio.description: The update brings AI-powered transcription and localization to native HubSpot video content. It enables a broader audience reach and more professional, accessible video marketing straight from your CRM. *available to all Content Hub Pro+ customers

improved-video-clip-transcript-editing.title: Improved Video Clip Transcript Editing
improved-video-clip-transcript-editing.description: This update adds an in-app transcript editing feature that was previously unavailable. With streamlined access and real-time preview, your team can quickly refine captions for clips, boosting video quality and accessibility. *available to all Content Hub Pro+ customers

video-chapter-editing.title: Video Chapter Editing
video-chapter-editing.description: HubSpot now enables in-platform chapter editing for hosted video content. This unlocks a more polished and user-friendly video experience without needing third-party tools or technical skills. *available to all Content Hub Pro+ customers

boost-video-seo-performance-with-structu.title: Boost Video SEO Performance with Structured Data
boost-video-seo-performance-with-structu.description: Structured data tagging for videos is now built-in, meaning SEO best practices are applied by default. You get better visibility and performance for your content automatically, without needing to configure anything yourself. *available to all Marketing, Content, and Service Pro+ customers

next-meetings-last-activity-columns-in-t.title: Next Meetings & Last Activity Columns in the Deals Table of the Sales Workspace
next-meetings-last-activity-columns-in-t.description: These columns bring essential sales context directly into the main deals table. It transforms your workspace into a more dynamic and actionable environment, designed for speed and prioritization. *available to all Sales Hub Pro+ customers

automatic-ticket-topic-identification-po.title: Automatic Ticket Topic Identification powered by AI
automatic-ticket-topic-identification-po.description: This feature brings automated intelligence to your support workflows. By auto-populating the 'category' field, you’ll get cleaner data and faster insights without extra effort. *available to all Service Hub Enterprise customers

today-s-insights-feed.title: Today’s Insights Feed
today-s-insights-feed.description: ​​The feed surfaces time-sensitive insights directly in your Help Desk, removing the need to search for them. This update turns passive metrics into proactive recommendations that drive better customer service outcomes day-to-day. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

bring-your-brand-voice-to-your-customer-.title: Bring Your Brand Voice to Your Customer Agent
bring-your-brand-voice-to-your-customer-.description: The Customer Agent now supports brand voice settings, so your tone comes through in every message it sends. You can fine-tune responses to better reflect your company's personality, making AI support feel more like your actual team. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

new-card-message-analytics-in-the-help-d.title: New card: Message Analytics in the Help Desk Summary Tab
new-card-message-analytics-in-the-help-d.description: This card consolidates conversation analytics into the Help Desk interface, reducing the need to switch to external dashboards. With compact, contextual performance data now part of your daily workflow, this update streamlines team management and operational awareness. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

new-card-ticket-priority-on-the-help-des.title: New Card: Ticket priority on the Help Desk Summary Tab
new-card-ticket-priority-on-the-help-des.description: The Ticket Priority card adds real-time ticket categorization to the Help Desk Summary view. This feature improves team responsiveness and workload balancing without needing separate reports or filters. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

new-ticket-owner-and-requested-by-column.title: NEW "Ticket Owner" and "Requested by" columns in Customer Portal
new-ticket-owner-and-requested-by-column.description: These new columns were added to improve the customer experience by surfacing relevant ownership information directly in the ticket list. This change reduces ambiguity, enhances clarity, and empowers users with immediate insights into ticket handling. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

service-hub-journey-analytics.title: Service Hub Journey Analytics
service-hub-journey-analytics.description: This capability extends Journey Analytics to Service Hub, previously available only in Marketing. It offers powerful visualization and filtering tools to track real-world service flows, giving operations teams actionable data to optimize support. *available to all Service Hub Enterprise customers

audit-logs-for-customer-agent-actions.title: Audit Logs for Customer Agent Actions
audit-logs-for-customer-agent-actions.description: This adds a critical layer of visibility to AI activity within the CRM. Now you can audit Customer Agent’s behavior just like a human user, bringing trust and governance to AI automation. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

hubspot-hosted-domains-now-available-for.title: HubSpot Hosted Domains now available for Customer Portal
hubspot-hosted-domains-now-available-for.description: This launch removes the prior dependency on external domain setup, streamlining onboarding. Teams now get started faster, test features earlier, and update their domain later—providing more flexibility and quicker time to value. *available to all Service Hub Pro+ customers

control-editing-access-for-specific-pipe.title: Control editing access for specific pipeline stages: Tickets & Custom Objects
control-editing-access-for-specific-pipe.description: This release introduces fine-grained access controls at the stage level, allowing selective editing within pipelines. Previously, access was all-or-nothing; now, you can safeguard sensitive steps while enabling collaboration across teams. *available to all Sales Hub and Service Hub Pro+ customers

enroll-in-hubspot-payments-from-the-app-.title: Enroll in HubSpot Payments from the App Marketplace
enroll-in-hubspot-payments-from-the-app-.description: Previously, enrolling in Payments required navigating elsewhere in the app. Now, with enrollment available through the App Marketplace, it's easier than ever to get started and manage your payment tools from a centralized hub. *available to all Commerce Hub Starter+ customers

commerce-analytics-suite.title: Commerce Analytics Suite
commerce-analytics-suite.description: This suite adds new commerce-focused dashboards and filters into the existing Analytics tools. By integrating revenue data seamlessly with your HubSpot ecosystem, it improves decision-making and brings ecommerce insights closer to your marketing and sales processes. *available to all Commerce Hub Pro+ customers

filter-dataset-based-reports-on-dashboar.title: Filter Dataset-Based Reports on Dashboards
filter-dataset-based-reports-on-dashboar.description: Dataset-based reports are now interactive at the dashboard level. This reduces back-and-forth and puts more power into the hands of dashboard viewers. *available to all Operations Hub Pro+ customers

access-data-quality-insights-from-proper.title: Access data quality insights from property settings
access-data-quality-insights-from-proper.description: This update integrates data quality alerts into your property management flow. You get a smoother, faster way to ensure your CRM data stays accurate without extra navigation. *available to all Operations Hub Pro+ customers

google-chat-app-update-report-sharing-an.title: Google Chat App Update: Report Sharing and Link Previews
google-chat-app-update-report-sharing-an.description: This update brings instant link previews and report sharing to Google Chat. It improves transparency and speeds up communication with your team directly in chat. *available to all hubs and tiers

surveymonkey-app-updates-new-settings-sy.title: SurveyMonkey app updates: new settings, syncing, and workflow actions
surveymonkey-app-updates-new-settings-sy.description: This update significantly enhances the SurveyMonkey app with more settings control, deeper data integration, and actionable automation. You can now tailor your integration to your processes, respond to surveys automatically, and improve marketing and support agility. *available to all hubs and tiers

improved-app-card-configuration-experien.title: Improved App Card Configuration Experience for Marketplace Apps
improved-app-card-configuration-experien.description: Previously, setting up app cards required manual formatting and lacked immediate visual feedback. Now, the updated experience includes an intuitive editor and clearer validation, enabling faster, more accurate configuration for developers and partners. *available to all hubs and tiers

language-auto-translation-of-primary-app.title: Language Auto-translation of Primary App Listing Changes
language-auto-translation-of-primary-app.description: This automation removes a major barrier for global reach on the HubSpot Marketplace. It helps maintain high-quality, multi-language listings while reducing overhead and potential errors from manual translation. *available to all hubs and tiers

slack-app-update-improvements-to-workflo.title: Slack app update: improvements to workflow actions
slack-app-update-improvements-to-workflo.description: This update upgrades the HubSpot-Slack connector with deeper workflow integration. With more flexible options, teams can move from basic alerts to full operational automation inside Slack. *available to all HubSpot Pro+ customers

data-enrichment-update-to-settings.title: Data Enrichment Update to Settings
data-enrichment-update-to-settings.description: Settings now offer greater clarity and control over enrichment tools, improving governance and confidence in automated data population. It’s a usability win that empowers better decision-making for data stewardship and system configuration. *available to all hubs and tiers

email-digests-for-research-intent.title: Email Digests for Research Intent
email-digests-for-research-intent.description: This feature packages intent signals into a digestible email format, making insights more accessible to reps. It shifts intent from dashboard-only to inbox-ready, driving proactive follow-up and better conversion. *available to all hubs and tiers

app-marketplace-analytics-enhanced-data-.title: App Marketplace Analytics: Enhanced Data & Export for Pageviews by Domain
app-marketplace-analytics-enhanced-data-.description: This rollout extends Marketplace Analytics to include domain-level breakdowns and export options. It transforms raw data into actionable insights, giving developers more control over their GTM strategy. *available to all hubs and tiers

default-account-selection.title: Default Account Selection
default-account-selection.description: You can now set a default HubSpot account that automatically opens at login. It’s a simple improvement that brings a smoother, more focused experience for multi-account users. *available to all hubs and tiers

faster-property-creation-on-the-crm-inde.title: Faster Property Creation on the CRM Index Page
faster-property-creation-on-the-crm-inde.description: You can now add properties inline while working on CRM records. This update streamlines customization so you spend less time navigating and more time getting things done. *available to all hubs and tiers

automatically-format-property-data-at-th.title: Automatically Format Property Data at the Point of Entry
automatically-format-property-data-at-th.description: This update introduces real-time formatting for custom and standard fields, ensuring data is correctly structured on entry. By improving data hygiene at the point of input, you’ll prevent downstream issues and maintain cleaner databases. *available to all hubs and tiers

stage-calculated-properties.title: Stage-Calculated Properties
stage-calculated-properties.description: This update introduces out-of-the-box properties that calculate stage duration for deals and tickets. You’ll gain deeper insights faster and make better process improvements with less setup or reliance on custom fields. *available to all hubs and tiers

bulk-archive-now-available-for-propertie.title: Bulk archive now available for properties used in assets that don't prevent archiving
bulk-archive-now-available-for-propertie.description: The property archiving tool now distinguishes between blocking and non-blocking assets, unlocking bulk actions. This means cleaner data structures and less effort spent sorting through system dependencies, all while maintaining data integrity. *available to all hubs and tiers

phone-number-property-validations-and-au.title: Phone number property validations and auto-formatting
phone-number-property-validations-and-au.description: This update adds country-specific formatting and validation directly to phone number properties. It reduces manual cleanup and ensures your CRM data is ready for seamless integrations and outreach. *available to all hubs and tiers

enroll-records-in-workflows-from-a-crm-c.title: Enroll records in workflows from a CRM card
enroll-records-in-workflows-from-a-crm-c.description: This update places workflow actions directly within CRM cards, making automation faster and easier to access. Teams benefit from fewer steps, reduced training time, and a more connected experience that brings automation to the point of action. *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

ai-powered-data-model-recommendations.title: AI-powered Data Model Recommendations
ai-powered-data-model-recommendations.description: This update brings a personalized assistant into the data modeling experience. The AI suggests the optimal data architecture, reducing setup time, minimizing errors, and setting you up for future success in automation, reporting, and scale. *available to all Hubspot Pro+ customers

property-fill-rate-now-included-in-expor.title: Property fill rate now included in 'Export all properties'
property-fill-rate-now-included-in-expor.description: By adding fill rate to property exports, HubSpot gives you immediate insights into data hygiene. It’s a small but powerful addition that helps keep your CRM lean, relevant, and easier to manage long-term. *available to all hubs and tiers

ios-conditional-properties-on-deals-tick.title: [iOS] Conditional properties on Deals, Tickets & Custom objects
ios-conditional-properties-on-deals-tick.description: This update brings parity between desktop and mobile workflows by enabling conditional properties in the iOS app. Users can now experience more complete and logical record management on mobile, improving productivity and reducing data quality issues. *available to all HubSpot Pro+ customers This rollout introduces one of the most requested mobile capabilities—list access. You can now interact with list data from your phone just as you would on desktop, bridging productivity across devices. *avai

lists-on-mobile.title: Lists on Mobile
lists-on-mobile.description: This rollout introduces one of the most requested mobile capabilities—list access. You can now interact with list data from your phone just as you would on desktop, bridging productivity across devices. *available to all hubs and tiers

android-conditional-properties-and-requi.title: [Android] Conditional properties and required associations when creating Contacts & Companies
android-conditional-properties-and-requi.description: This launch brings desktop-level CRM controls to Android, closing a key functionality gap. By enforcing conditional logic and mandatory associations on mobile, teams can now trust the data entered away from the desk. *available to all hubs and tiers

ai-report-insights-on-mobile.title: AI Report Insights on Mobile
ai-report-insights-on-mobile.description: AI Report Insights, previously desktop-only, are now accessible on mobile. This brings smart analytics to more users in real-time, improving how your team understands and reacts to data—wherever they are. *available to all hubs and tiers

automation-overview.title: Automation Overview
automation-overview.description: Automation Overview solves the challenge of scattered insights by consolidating automation performance across tools. It’s a new control center that helps admins monitor engagement, reduce inefficiencies, and ensure strategic alignment from one simple interface. *available to all HubSpot Pro+ customers

certification-tracking-made-easy-with-th.title: Certification Tracking made easy with the new My Team Dashboard!
certification-tracking-made-easy-with-th.description: This update introduces a unified dashboard for certification tracking that was previously fragmented or inaccessible. With greater visibility and control over certification data, team leaders can promote accountability and maximize learning ROI. *available to all hubs and tiers
